title: 1st Ever Mr.BeardRock City Facial Hair Competition
description:
Calling all of you facially hirsute throwbacks out there, gather 
up and deliver your fine self, along with your inner and outer 
beards to the House of Automatic Subconscious, where we shall take 
the time to parade you before us like so much hairy meat and pass 
judgment upon those locks and curls that cascade off of the area 
known as your chinny-chin-chin. There will be 4 prime categories: 
Full-Beard, Moustache, Freestyle Full Beard, Fake Beard and quite 
probably not possibly, an "Other" category.

As per usual in this sort of event, our highly esteemed panel of 
untrained professionals will judge upon such features as glossiness 
of pelt, lack of nits, creativity, fullness of body, amount of previous 
dinner ensconced within and other equally tangible parameters that attest 
to the care and feeding of your personal face troll. Bribery and 
foolishness are considered de rigueur.

All that is necessary is that you have some form of facial hair, a 
good and jolly spirit, and the necessary accoutrement of a cummerbund. 
One must have the proper air of formality around such an event as this, 
do not you agree?
print_description:
All razor-challenged, come out and display your fine hirsuteness at 
the 1st evah Mr. BeardRock Beautiful Beast Contest.

title: Casbah-blanca Night at The Booby Bar
description: The hot, swirling winds deposited a fine chalky sand across Rick's shoes as he stood in the doorway of his joint on the lower east side of Casablanca - Rick's Cafe Americain... Sound familiar? WELL IT SHOULD! Who among us has not had fine chalky sand blown across our shoes by hot swirling winds? But Tuesday night you can do that in a middle eastern setting with exotic music playing in the background and an equally exotic drink nestled in your hand as The Booby Bar is transformed into Rick's Cafe Americain for one awesome night! Costumes are not required to attend but, damn, they sure make things a lot more fun.

title: 4pyre²
description:
4pyre² is a 12ft pipe with propane burners on each end.  When the burners fire, the pipe is propelled around on two axes, tracing out the surface of a 12ft diameter sphere.

(4πr² is the formula for the surface area of a sphere of radius r.)

Enabling this pipe to spin is a gleaming machine of aluminum, stainless steel, bearings, shafts, hoses, rotary fluid unions, sprockets, chains, motors, encoders, and microcontrollers.  Standing nearly 18’ tall, it holds the sphere of fire high enough that visitors can get quite close.  There is also a panel where visitors can control the angle and the thrust of the propane burners, creating different patterns through the sphere.


4pyre² is a 12ft pipe with propane burners on each end.  When the burners fire, the pipe is propelled around on two axes, tracing out the surface of a 12ft diameter sphere.

(4πr² is the formula for the surface area of a sphere of radius r.)

Enabling this pipe to spin is a gleaming machine of aluminum, stainless steel, bearings, shafts, hoses, rotary fluid unions, sprockets, chains, motors, encoders, and microcontrollers.  Standing nearly 18’ tall, it holds the sphere of fire high enough that visitors can get quite close.  There is also a panel where visitors can control the angle and the thrust of the propane burners, creating different patterns through the sphere.

4pyre² was designed and built by Christopher Schardt (Spin, Ping, Yantra, Nebula), with major assistance from Peter Luka, Vince Mills, and Russ Zinner.
print_description: 4pyre² is a 12ft pipe with propane burners on each end which propel it around on two axes, tracing out a sphere.  Have a turn at the controls!

title: Leopard Lounge & Urban Jungle Day Spa
description: Swing by VW Bus Camp and relax in the Leopard Lounge and Urban Jungle Day Spa. We will have practitioners on hand to give foot and body massages, pedicures, hair tinseling and braiding, energy work, smudge blessings and tarot readings. Services available will depend on staff on hand, but the lounge is always open offering an intimate place to recline in the shade, relax to chill music and have a shot of tequila. Discover how powerful you really are and how to tap into your powers of manifestation as Creator. If it is time to Manifest the life you really want, see you in the AutoSub Dome! Not to miss! Bring a Friend! This class/workshop will be taught by Nanice Ellis - Global Facilitator of Peaceful Awakening, Host of "Chai with Nanice" on LATalkRadio.com and GODERGY on BBS Radio, International Life Coach, Healer and Author of 7 Inspirational Books.

title: pLAYA CHOIR REHEARSAL
description: On wed, thu, fri, and sat morning at 10:30 am, we will learn 5 songs together in harmony, ranging from gospel to original to circle-improvised songs. Madi, the choir director, is an energetic, unique and fiery choral director who has been directing this ensemble for 6 years now! We welcome everyone that can sing or at least use your voice! and if you are mute or sworn to silence, we can find something for you to contribute too, if you want to be a part of our choir! (maybe you sign?) Singers of all abilities are welcome! We love readers, but if you don't read, it's OK. If you sing in the shower, we love you! If you sing to the radio, we want you! If you have choral experience, we need you! If you play a rhythm section instrument, please contact Madi right away! We give a Sunday service where we sing for a healthy and dusty audience at 11 am, so if you can't commit to the sunday service, well, you can still be a part of the choir! (but we'd rather you stuck around for the performance..!) This year, we will rehearse in Jazz Cafe, as we have in the past. But our sunday service will be in the center circle of center camp! This way, we should have enough room for the audience this time! come join us for some wonderful singing, fun and fierce rehearsals and a chance to meet some really awesome folks who you might not have met otherwise!
print_description: come join us for playa choir rehearsal

title: Risley Pool
description:
There are Four Cardinal Rules of Pool.

These are given by the person who has been doing Pool the longest, and read ceremonially whenever a new person does Pool for the first time.

1) Wear as much or as little clothing as you want, no pressure either way.

2) No food, drinks, or drugs in the pool, unless there's enough for everybody and everybody wants some.

3) No bodily fluids in the pool. ...Unless there's enough for everybody and everybody wants some.

4) No unnecessary splashing. This rule, of course, allows for plenty of necessary splashing. (And good luck splashing with pillows in the playa version!)
print_description:
No bodily fluids, food, or drugs in the pool... Unless there's enough for everybody and everybody wants some.

Feeling gorges?
other_location: The pillow filled kiddie pool at the base of the Man

title: Rolling & Stoned Party
description:
Hell yeah! Tarzan is back on the Playa once again playing the best the Stones have to offer after missing last year’s Burn for his "fishing trip"!?!

Oh Fuck! Our Lovely Camp is being taken over again by the miscreants from Shit Beer Camp. At Their Satanic Majesties Request, Camp Zanzibar has given in, and Tarzan himself will be spinning the best the Stones have to offer. Come shake off the playa dust and that Electo-buzz out of your ears, have a cold one, and RAWK OUT! Wait, No Way! REAL non-electronic music on the Playa? Hell Fuckin' Yeah! If you're lucky you might be seen Dancing with Mr. D, Himself! Pleased to meet you, Hope you guess my name . . .

title: Shamanista Extraction How-To Workshop
description:
Core Shamanism Extraction healing journey workshop. Clearing those bad vibes and hitchhikers.
In all healing modalities, we need to clear negative energy while shielding ourselves from it. Shamanista protocols employ an animal spirit ally to help us, in a drumming journey to effect a shamanic state of consciousness, where we can 'see' what needs to be done. Placing positive light in place of the extraction is a crucial end maneuver.

Today is the day to feel like a natural Womyn!!!

title: So, you want to be a SLUT?
description: This workshop is for those considering consensual non-monogamy, those practicing it, and those just curious. We will define consensual non-monogamy and differentiate it from other relationship styles. We will share our experiences in the open relationship world.  The panel for this workshop includes individuals who have practiced various styles of consensual non-monogamy, including open relations, swinging, polyamory, polifidelity, and single but non-monogamous. We will discuss how we deal with jealousy, as well as some risks. Most of all we will try to answer whatever questions you may have. Safer Sex Camp is a drug free zone (this includes tobacco and alcohol). Photography is prohibited. Participants only.
print_description: A workshop on consensual non-monogamy. Discussions on swinging, polyamory, polyfidelity, single & poly, jealousy/compersion safer sex & more.

title: The Orgasamator Experience
description: We've built an I-Scream Parlour, playa style, and it's the home of our new Orgasamator.  The Orgasmatron has been a fixture at Burning Man for several years, giving thousands of women extreme physical pleasure, in an environment that is very safe, comfortable and private.  Well, this year we've completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and we've given it a new name: The Orgasmator.  You will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, and deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience that is safe and leaves you feeling completely respected and in-control.  Come solo, or better yet, bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and personal experience.  You can wear as much or as little as you would like while riding this marvelous machine, and you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense.  If you are a woman, the Orgasamator Experience at Spanky's I-Scream Parlour is something you won't want to miss.
print_description: We've upgraded our well-known Orgasmatron this year to give women even more intense physical pleasure, in an environment that's safe and comfortable.

title: 100 Brides March
description:
She said "YES!"

Let's all walk down the aisle to celebrate Joselynn Planks engagement to Randy Engstrom ( Undisputed, 2009 Mayor of Black Rock City) in a 100 bride march to the Man. Wednesday Night at Burningman all Brides (that means YOU and YOU yes...we really do mean YOU) Show up at our camp (RAIR) 4:30 & B to walk the Aisle to THE MAN. A sweet remix of the wedding march will play behind the treehugger/puking unicorn bus courtesy of DJ Whatever. Join us for a Champagne toast to the Bride, words of inspiration from the Reverend Thomasutra and a night of rock n' roll in bride regalia.

Come march cause you believe in love or cause you want to believe in love! Come march cause you already have a dress or you would love to have a dress! Come march cause this is your big break to bride up without all the family drama! Come march cause it was so much fun (or not) when you did it the first time. Come and MARCH cause you might never do it or do it again. Come for Joselynn. Come for yourself. Come for fun. Come to be serious. Come to be silly. JUST COME.

Who: YOU!
What: 100 Brides march for the Bacharette Party of Joselynn Plank
Where: Wed night - Burningman 2010 - Return of Arson Island Resort (RAIR) 4:30 & B
When: When the sun hits the mountain
How: Get yourself a wedding dress (in any state of repair or disarray) and show up to join the fun

Now get out there and start looking for your dress. Men & Women are all invited as long as they bride up!
print_description: 100 Brides March for Love, Bach. Party of Joselynn,Wed night- Return of Arson Island Resort (RAIR) to The Man at Sunset - Wear a wedding dress!

Sound by Stag6Pro Sound, Sodalicious and Rukus  Lighting by Stage6 Pro and  Harmonic Lights  Refreshments provided by Yardz Bar  Fire Performance by the Arizona Fire Conclave  Shade provided by Mister God and the Amphibians  City provided by the Black Rock City Department of Public Works  Dust provided by YOU! title: 80's Dancing Night!
description:
80 TO 85 DEGREES
So many changes and innovations in music occurred during the years 1980 to 1985. Come relive some of the greatest tracks of true alternative music with us. We will be serving absinthe, running our hookah tent, and lounging in couches. The music starts at 10PM and goes until sunrise. Siouxsie, Cure, Shriekback, New Order, Smiths, Dead Can Dance, Joy Division, Cocteau Twins, This Mortal Coil, Kate Bush, etc.
Brought to you by Ranger Pitbull.

title: 8th Annual Group W Welcome the Sun Cocktail Party
description:
What:  Once Again Group W is hosting our Friday Morning Sunrise/Welcome the Sun Cocktail Party at Burning Man - 8th Annual edition.  Featuring Bloody Marys mixed from scratch, coffee, mimosas and a vast array other drinks, with or without alcohol.

Why:  So we can spend all day Friday slinging drinks at friends new and old.

Where:  Where-ever we end up on the Playa.  Put your nose in the air and set it for booze!

When:  Starting at Sunrise Friday, and lasting until all is drunk or the generator runs out of gas.

Remember, to have a hard day of drinking you need to start EARLY.

Bring your own cup, you'll get more!

title: A damn fine cup of coffee!
description: As you stumble out into the dust, a familiar scent stirs the inhabiting spirit within you... Each and every morning at Twin Freaks, come enjoy a DAMN fine cup of coffee and a slice of the playa's best cherry pie (while supplies last). So good it might distract you from the mission at hand, leaving you susceptible to BOB's devilish schemes. But fear not, our talking log will coach you through the day, and help you to try and solve your own personal Burning Man mysteries. Or perhaps relax inside the BLACK LODGE dome while enjoying some deep and jazzy musical vibrations while contemplating the relationship between LOVE and FEAR. We're here for you.

title: Afterglow: Burningman Edition
description: Afterglow was conceived as a chance to wind down after a long weekend by listening to some chill music and having a few drinks with friends. The idea is to allow some of SF's most talented and multi-faceted dance music DJ's an opportunity to dig deeper into their collections and play music they wouldn't be able to in a club setting. Anything's game, from ambient to dub techno, idm, atmospheric drum n bass, downtempo, future jazz, deep house and beyond. Special Burningman Edition. Pre-playa
print_description: Come bask in the afterglow of the week with a special pre-temple burn edition of Afterglow. Ambient, downtempo, chill, dub electronica.

title: Afternoon SnowCones at Contraptionists
description: Join us for SnowCones in our large Breeze catching Shade Tent Contraption from 1 till 3 every afternoon from Monday to Saturday while the ice and shavers last.    Over heated little ones in need and under their teens may ask anytime during the day whether we have any shaving Ice to cool them down.    Enjoy fine shaved Snow with Sour electrolytes or Sweet Syrups in flavors of our choice as we deny you your desires in life and give you what we know you need, sorta like in real life but a bit worse.    Success of your quest is Highly dependent on the Ice supply which, once shaved, flavored and ingested can Melt quickly in the heat of the day. Ask about solutions to a shortage if this happens and you still have a severe need of Cool.    If the Ice has melted with no solutions available, you can still stop by and cool off for a minute in our self venting dust reducing open front shade Contraption and watch the city roll by as you cool down again to prepare for your next trek down the chosen path.  Please let any BRC Rangers or Emergency response volunteers to cut into line for a quick cooling if they stop by.  The Contraptionists also Host Naked Misted Twister at the same time of day which is for Adults only and screened with no spectators allowed. See information on N.M.T. and our other hosted attractions at Contraptionists listed here in the online directory and in the Who What Where directory on the Playa separately, or on our website Contraptionists.com.
print_description: Join us for SnowCones in our Shade Contraption from 1-3 every afternoon from Monday to Saturday.   Over heated kids may ask anytime if we have Ice.

description: Before the internet there was the ionosphere and shortwave radio. Listen to the world, and if there is an operator on hand, you can talk too. When N2BA (or another licensed ham) is on hand, the station will be put on the air and we'll see who we can talk to.

title: ALLNESS Blessings at the Altar of Mercy
description:
This Deeksha is dispensed the qintessential UNGURU, a healer who has gifted over 100,000 healings in his lifetime. 

One can not BUY the Grace of Shakti-Pat, DEEKSHA or ONENESS. The Sacred is not for Sale. That which is the highest costs you everything or it cost you Nothing. 

Nor can such Grace be attained to be dispensed upon others in a meaningful way by spending thousands of dollars and spending less than 2 weeks to learn. 

Come receive a simple TOUCH of MERCY & REDEMPTION. The Allness Blessing will open your crown, third eye, heart, activate and balance your endocrine system including your Pineal gland. 

Come release your pain at the Altar of Mercy and be reborn into your innate grace of being.  Feel your Heart Sing, your Spirit Soar and your pains begin to vanish. Come for a Blessing/Blissing. The only Price you pay is the loss of your Pain.
This service is most likely to be found at the Healing Dome at Entheon Village or the Heart Chakra healing space at Sacred Spaces but we will post the schedule or last minute changes here.

title: Aluminaughty Presents: Futuristic Fashion Show
description:
Build it and they will come!  Come join us for a run down our constructed CATWALK stage in your best Metropolis inspired outfit.   

Or just come and watch this sunset-inspired spectacle.  

If desert stardom is your thing, wear your best Burning Man get-up, your Barbarella-type duds, or your Metropolis/Aluminum inspired outfit and have your model moment on our stage.  

Props and other costumes will be available on-site.

MUSIC will be provided by STADENCO during the runway show and dome dance party directly following this runway event.


PLEASE CHECK THE SIGNPOST AT 9:00 AND F TO FIND OUR EXACT CAMP LOCATION. 

Participants should gather for costuming session--followed by runway show/music.  SPECTATORS WELCOME!

Photos will be taken during this event.

title: Aluminum Can Recycling
description:
Bring us your cans! That's right, we want all of your aluminum cans at Recycle Camp, Monday through Sunday 9 AM to 6 PM. Join in the fun & RECYCLE..!! Get everyone in your camp to separate out your aluminum cans, bring them to Recycle Camp in Center Camp at 5:55 & the Inner Circle. We're right behind the Cafe.

When you arrive, a friendly Recycle Camp Volunteer will greet you and show you where to sort your cans. Once they're sorted, you get to ride the bicycle that powers The Blue Duck, our state of the Art aluminum can crushing machine. Or you can feed the machine your cans & watch them get crushed. After your cans are crushed, we'll show you where they go next.

Proceeds from the aluminum are donated to the Gerlach School. Last year we were able to donate $1500 to the school. We want to thank all the participants of Black Rock City for helping to make this possible.
print_description: Bring us your cans! That's right, we want all of your aluminum cans at Recycle Camp, Monday through Sunday 9 AM to 6 PM. Join in the fun & RECYCLE..!!

title: Amateur Naked-Eye Astronomy
description:
The night sky has been visible more or less unchanged to human beings for millions of years. Each day it tells an amazing story about the Universe we live in, and much of that story can be observed with no more than your eyes, hands, and a clear view of the sky.

We'll meet at Playasophy camp and then walk out to some deep playa to get a non-polluted view. Any and all levels of astronomy experience are welcome: Newbie? We'll be happy to walk you through the basics. Astonomy professor? Please come teach us!

In the event of clouds or dust, we'll meet at camp and just geek out about how cool the Universe is, which is only slightly less fun. See you there!
print_description: Find your latitude, spot planets, predict moon phase & much more using just your eyes, hands, and a clear sky. Meet @ camp then head to deep playa.

title: Amish Motel
description:
We at CampoAlegre are a small but vital component of the Amish community of
Black Rock City.  Most Burners would say: Amish, what Amish?   To which we
would reply: Who the hell do you think builds the Man every year?  He is just
another barn raising event for the formidable Amish community.
 In an effort to reach out to the English community at BRC, CampoAlegre is
opening Rumspringa Motel to the general public.  For Hell Night (Wednesday) only, we are
offering a clean, comfortable but simple space for our participating visitors
to enjoy the carnal pleasures that are typically available to our youth during
their period of Rumspringa.  (Dont know what Rumspringa is?  Thats what
Google is for, English) All the while,  their shadow play will be open for our
guests to see as they enjoy the well renowned Amish hospitality of the Devilas
Playground Bar and Grill (Grill open subject to our discretion).  Hell Night is Wednesday, Sept. 01,2010 located at 3:00 and Guangzhou.  Vacancies open at the Rumspringa Motel where the Amish party like its 1899 and no one is ever
shunned.
print_description: CampoAlegre presents Rumspringa Motel.  We welcome our guests to inspire others with their shadow play in our Amish Hotel. Wed. 9pm. 3 and G. BRC

title: Angels and Shamans + Whimsical Mystic
description:
Find this healing work at Entheon village & Sacred Spaces. Come enjoy the healing gifts and Profound Love of the hardest working and most hilarious healer on the Playa and Facebook...The Whimsical Mystic. 

Here is a recent testimonial to give an idea of what is available.

Megan Read June 6 at 12:47am 
..My friend is in a coma she had a major heart attack and major stroke she has no brain function and her kidneys have failed and her body slowly shutting down and she has a 5 year old son no one knows what has caused this she has been in a coma 2 weeks now 

Megan Read June 13 at 2:58am 
Hey thanks for ur healing energy for my friend.  A miracle happened this week. She woke up from her coma. The doctors said her organs had all shut down. She was brain dead and there was no hope of her waking up. But she woke up with no memory loss and the doctors can’t find much wrong with her.  She is up eating, talking, walking, doing everything natural. It’s a miracle! Doctors are amazed & so are every one of her friends and family 


Tentative location for the Temple of Touch and the Altar of Mercy will be with Sacred Spaces Villages or Entheon village, but we are open to any hosting with a 10x20 

The Whimsical Mystic shared his work at Burning Man, Bhakti-fest, Symbiosis, EarthDance, Water Woman world and the International Alchemy Conference just last year - and never turns anyone in need away who can not afford to pay- even outside of burning man

Offerings include Awakening the Sacred Feminine workshops,Allness Blessings, healings,. 

Receive a group healing while you wait for a personal session or just chill looking out on the Esplanade b4 and after your session as space permits.

Come visit us at our Facebook page http://www.facebook.com/pages/Free-Distance-Healing-Project/395796820020?ref=ts 
to register for our separate Sacred Feminine events so that we can gauge space and support needs.

Thousands of testimonials on website
print_description: Amazing Angel-Shaman healings all day, everyday with the WhimsicalMystic. Over 100,000 healings. Founder of the Facebook Free Distance Healing Project
other_location: Sacred Spaces Village, possibly Angels, Shamans yogi at Bhagdad and 3 or Center camp

Will detail the schedule when we know it.Come experience the healing work of the Hardest working & possibly the most Hilarious healer on the playa.  More than healings, but activations, ALLNESS blessings, empowerments, attunements. A true Guru's Grace in his touch.
Don't take his word for it. Here are just two of many thousands of similar testimonials:

..My friend is in a coma she had a major heart attack and major stroke she has no brain function and her kidneys have failed and her body slowly shutting down and she has a 5 year old son no one knows what has caused this she has been in a coma 2 weeks now

Hey thanks for ur healing prayers for my friend.  A miracle happened this week. She woke up from her coma. The doctors said her organs had all shut down. She is up eating, talking, walking, doing everything natural. It’s a miracle! Doctors are amazed & so are every one of her friends and family 

Hi Whimsical,

title: Annual ePlaya/3playa Meet & Greet
description: Now in its 8th year, come by the one tradition that is always looked forward to almost as much as the burn itself:  The annual ePlaya/3Playa Meet & Greet, again hosted by everyone's favorite theme camp, Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro.  It will again be held on Thursday evening, beginning at 6 p.m. and lasting well into the night.  This is your chance to meet that special burner you have been flirting with or fighting with on the ePlaya throughout the year.  We do ask that you bring something to share, whether it be ice, food, or drink.  In the past we have had nearly 200 people show up and this year should be no exception.  A splendid time is guaranteed for all.

title: Anonymous Village
description: Anonymous Village is an oasis of fun, 12 step meetings and fellowship for all those who desire some serenity in the desert. We host meetings of AA, NA, OA, Alanon and other similar seekers of a workable life. These meetings are every 3 hours or as requested. We also help relocate those that have tired of their old non-working ways to Anonymous Village and provide appropriate support. We have activities including pot lucks, group bicycle rides and whatever is envisioned. Welcome Home!
print_description: Anonymous Village is a oasis of fun, 12 step meetings and fellowship for all those who desire some serenity in the desert.

title: Anti M's Home for Wayward Art
description: Anti M's Home for Wayward Art is a place for small art, medium art, amateur art, but especially Bad Art, Lost Art, Found Art, Art which Needs a Good Spanking, and of course, Wayward Art. This is not a gallery, it is more like juvenile detention for art, an orphanage, a half-way house for misfit art. All art in the Home is up for adoption, all the prospective new parent needs to do is fill out a small adoption form and clip it to the Home in place of their newfound art darling. Art may also be committed to the Home, just put it securely in place and say good-bye. While the emphasis is on visual art such as paintings, drawings and photos, sculptural art and trinkets found their way into the Home last year and then found new homes.
print_description: A gallery for small art, odd art, lost or found art.  Adopt a piece and take it home, or donate you Bad, Bad Art. Original pieces welcome.

title: Apres Ski - Great White North Party
description:
Apre's Ski BRC
a•près-ski[ah-prey-skee,ap-rey,noun] 

The period of relaxation after skiing and a rich cultural heritage at ski resorts worldwide. After a long day on the playa slopes come and mingle with the snowmen, frolic with our gogo dancing ski bunnies and relax your muscles in our winter wonderland. Cross the Great White Northern border and get your very own beaver. Party in the snow storm.

DJ's - world renowned Whistler DJ's

title: Apterous - The burning of the Portal
description:
Join us for the spectacular final burning of the Aeolian Pyrophonic Hall & Whispering Wall, AKA "the Portal" featuring a performance extravaganza with the world premier of Apterous, a stilt dance performance featuring a tribe of giant winged creatures into which is born a creature without wings.  Giant wings, whirling, tall beings, broken children and quirky redemption emerge from the playa for the burning of the Portal. Born wingless, an outcast in a tribe of giant winged stilted creatures, Apterous claims the beauty of his destiny and opens a Portal of possibilities for his people. Apterous features incredible costuming, giant wings and the talents of 27 dancers.

We will light the structure on fire, and the flames engulfing the lacy walls will be the stage on which this performance unrolls.  

Accompanied by fire organ and harp soundscape, this performance features the ritual removal of the Whispering Wall scroll after a week of collecting the hopes, fears, dreams, secrets and whispers of the citizens of Black Rock City.  A procession will carry the scroll of our intentions into the Temple after the burning of the Portal structure.

title: Barefoot Bliss
description:
Come to Great Balls of Fire to receive the best care available on the Playa for women with two feet (or even one!). The alkaline quality of the Playa surface can dehydrate and damage our skin, and our feet get a big dose of it if you’re wearing sandals, flip-flops, or *going barefoot*. Our feet are a part of our bodies that are often receive far less attention than they deserve given how vital good foot health is for our mobility and overall well-being. So reconnect with your feet and revitalize them by pampering them with a Barefoot Bliss treatment that includes a lemon juice bathing to neutralize alkalinity, followed by a luxuriant reflexology foot massage using rehydrating lotion. The treatment requires being barefoot, (of course!) and utter bliss is the guaranteed result, hence the name. Your feet will thank you!
 
The gift of Barefoot Bliss is available throughout each day beginning Tuesday morning. Look for the Barefoot Bliss signs at the Great Balls of Fire camp and ask for Pringles. It’s offered primarily for women of the Playa, but Pringles will have a female assistant who will be available at select times for interested boyfriends and overflow women.
print_description: Pamper your feet with a treatment that includes a lemon juice bathing followed by a foot massage w/rehydrating lotion. Offered for women of the Playa.

title: Bare Humanity
description:
Nude portraits of humans. Singles, couples, groups. Each participant gets a free gallery quality 11x14 gelatin silver print on premium fiber paper. Prints will be mailed a few weeks after the event, as I work in traditional emulsion based process. Everyone is welcome, including families with children.

The human form is art’s oldest and most persistent subject. Photography, perhaps the most documentarian of all art forms, is a particularly challenging medium for it. My approach is not to challenge photography’s inherent literalism but work within its framework.  My subjects are real people, who happen to be nude and whose nudity is neither contrived nor interactive. They don’t call for an action or elicit a particular response from the viewer.

I also hope that my images aren’t nudesploitation either:  the human form I strive for isn’t employed to talk about anything else whatsoever. Hence, I don’t work with professional models or in a studio. If you are interested in posing for this project, please come by.  

If you are interested in assisting, and are well versed in practice and theory of photography as an art medium, please get in touch.
print_description: Nude portraits of humans. Singles, couples, groups. Each participant gets a free gallery quality 11x14 gelatin silver print on premium fiber paper.

title: Be a Private Eye
description:
Solve a hard-boiled mystery at the Deus Ex Detective Agency! Stop by to listen
to the sad but intriguing cases of customers in need of a private eye, don
your sleuthing garb, and then take off to follow clues (and a twisting plot)
around the city. Show up any time during these hours to receive your first clue.

The Deus Ex Detective Agency is a nostalgic 1940's office where participants can take on the role of a private eye. They will be presented with intriguing cases prepared by our camp members playing the roles of various characters in a scripted mystery. The office will be the starting point where potential detectives can enter our world, receive initial clues, and put on detective costumes to distinguish themselves as they travel around the city, following a
scavenger hunt-like trail of clues.

If you have always wanted to fly, and never tried...  If you have a desire to take hooping to a higher level... If you like curves, bored with tire swings, and your spinning class goes nowhere, this class is for you.  Do you want to have fun spinning in the air making pretty poses?  I'll teach you how to look and feel fabulous!  Please wear tight clothing that won't fall in your face when you are upside down! title: BE YOUR AVATAR AND SAVE THE WORLD!
description:
iReverend Alex is the creator of modern Avatarism. You can check out his blog at avatarism.org for stories and info.

If you think you have magickal powers, you probably do! Use the playa to field test those super powers. Embody archetypes, super heroes, faeries, magickal creatures, and ancient gods to influence your living character. This workshop will discuss; applied magick, dramatic ritual, brain change, altered states, energy vampirism, self hypnosis, conscious creation, and the awesome power of language. We will test out compassionate self defense, and gain strength in getting what we want. let us explore together and make decisions that could change your life forever. Realize your personal goals and correct bad habits. We will discuss body awareness, health, and the formula to gaining self control. Up-level your game. Be the fearless creator of your own life. You are the winner, You are the star, You are Avatar! Celebrate the endless possibilities for excellence. There will be a Q&A session, and after, we will conduct a powerful re birth experience in "The iReverend's Rebirth Tube," a 3 story high, knit, bungi tube, erected for just this purpose.  All "re birthers", will be initiated, hung upside down, squeezed through the "birth canal,"  and renamed with a moniker of power upon emergence.  iRev. Alex is an ordained Reverend, a sound healer, yoga teacher, creative shaman, Cirque du Soleil clown, voice actor in Ben 10, Batman, and Transformers animated series, star of the indie film Saints and Soldiers, star of 80's sitcom Charles in Charge, and His writing has been honored with a reading at Los Angeles City Hall. Alex brings humor, a lifetime of experience creating dynamic characters, and a presentation style that entertains and captivates. Come and participate. Suspend your disbelief and join the dance of conscious self creation. This workshop is the perfect way to take the playa home. Bring snacks and water. All welcome. Costumes encouraged. fnord.
print_description: Use the playa to field test your super powers, we will discuss; applied magick, dramatic ritual, brain change, altered states, and the power of words.

title: "Bhakti Garden Party" @ Sacred Spaces
description:
Weaving our way through the evening, the stars sparkle as we bring in an incredible lineup of devotional music maestros often seen at such
places like Mystic Garden Party and Bhakti Fest. title: Black Lodge Freakout!
description:
In the traditions of our people, we speak of a place called the WHITE LODGE. There is also a legend of a place called the BLACK LODGE, the shadow self of the WHITE LODGE. Legend says that every spirit must pass through there on the way to perfection. There you will meet your own shadow self. Our people call it 'the dweller on the threshold.'

Every evening, bring along your doppleganger, confront fear, and dance it all away while you feel the love of our our daily dosage of beats. We've recreated the Black Lodge setting for just this occasion!

title: Black Rock Scouts
description:
Black Rock Scouts is a program for Burning Man kids, based on the Ten Principals of Burning Man. The goal is to teach kids what it takes to sustain life at Burning Man, how embrace their creativity, teach playa-survival skills and teach them how to get involved in their BRC community, not just skip through it. The ultimate goal is to inspire kids to volunteer as they grow up, take ownership of their community and become model burners. 

Camps, services and the Black Rock community will host playa-cational events and offer volunteer opportunities for kids. Scouts will earn patches, tokens or pins for things learned, survival skills achieved, volunteering, good deeds and connections made, to be worn on functional bandoleer sashes. Funds are being raised for patches, but hosts are welcome to provide patches, tokens, pendants or pins.

The hope is that the Black Rock community will accept and value Burner-kids as a vital part of their community, after all... they are the future of Burning Man.

Join us on Facebook and Yahoo Groups. Event schedule will be posted on Yahoo Groups, at Playa Info and Kidsville Center Camp. Volunteers and funds for patches are needed, so contact us if you'd like to help.
print_description: BRS hosts daily events & volunteer opportunities for kids, where they earn patches & tokens for skills learned. Schedule @ Playa Info & Kidsville.

Kids are welcome to bring a camera for a photo walk-about while learning from the professionals. Kids must be accompanied by a parent.
print_description: Kids will learn what it's like to be a media photographer. Bring a camera for the photo-walkabout. Kids must be accompanied by a parent.

title: blackSKYwhite
description:
Join us in the Dust Circus camp for the shows of blackSKYwhite Aliens Circus from Russia. They will bring citizens of BRC Metropolis to their fantastic planet introducing them to some of the surreal and grotesque entities that belong in realms of darkness. Since 1988 “blackSKYwhite” has been shocking audiences in many famous international shows as Edinburgh Theatrical Festival, London International Mime Festival, Glastonbury Festival and dozens more. Finally this world famous and repeated awarded troupe comes to Burning man in 2010! 
Their shows illuminate the term 'total theatre': the costumes, scenery, lighting, music and movement blend so seamlessly into a language we all recognize in our deepest emotions and dreams. In this bizarre world there are aliens and creepy crawlies that are fascinating as they twitch and squirm. 
They are the products of a riotous imagination and we are as enthralled as we are repelled. There is beauty and fear, malice and mischief, magnificent creations jerking and wobbling and shuffling and slithering and bouncing around the stage. It is a dance macabre of feverish rhythms.
print_description: blackSKYwhite Aliens Circus: costumes, lighting, music and movement blend into a language we all recognize in our deepest emotions and dreams.

Instead of eating one bite while preparing the next one, happily dwell in whatever bite you happen to be eating *right now.*  Will include other blindfolded activities during the meal.  Vegan and gluten-free friendly. Please bring your own plate/bowl and a cup - no utensils necessary.

title: Bootie BRC @ AutoSub
description:
For five years, A Plus D – aka DJs Adrian & Mysterious D, along with Malderor, have brought Bootie BRC, the internationally-infamous mashup bootleg party, to Black Rock City! 

Launched in San Francisco in 2003, Bootie was the first club night in the United States dedicated solely to the burgeoning artform of the bootleg mashup -- and is now the biggest mashup event in the world, with regular parties in several cities on four continents. Keeping your brain guessing and body dancing with crazy and creative song combinations, Bootie's DJs celebrate -– and satirize -– the many different genres of music. 

Bootie mixes and matches every conceivable musical genre, era, and style into one big dance party where everyone feels welcome. It’s a place where all sounds, cultures, and sexualities can unite on the dance floor, providing the soundtrack for the A.D.D. generation ... and with free mashup CDs given away like candy!

Bootie ... because one song at a time just isn't enough.
print_description: A Plus D & Malderor bring the internationally-infamous mashup bootleg party to BRC, turning 2 songs into 1. Music for the A.D.D. generation! Free CDs!

description: Need some new spice for the playa dance floor? Join Carrie and live drummers for an ecstatic African rhythmic experience that will make you move! We will learn traditional celebration dance sequences from West Africa. All levels welcome, dust or shine! Carrie is a devotee and lover of movement and embodiment in all forms. She is a certified Hatha Yoga teacher and has taught yoga and West African drumming and dance workshops around the world. Carrie has studied with master teachers in Guinea, Mali, and the US, and lives in the San Francisco Bay Area

title: Burning Man Art: Creative Process and Purpose
description: This panel discussion explores the inspiration, challenges and creative process of building large-scale art at Burning Man with the Artists that create it. Candid discussions range from logistic nightmares to visionary downloads. What is the purpose of this art and where do we take it from here?  Audience Q & A to follow.  Last year's artist panel included: Peter Hudson, Bryan Tedrick, Kate Raudenbush, Michael Christian, Dan Das Man, Zach Coffin, Carey Thompson,  Harlan Emil, and was moderated by Daniel Pinchbeck. The 2010 Artist Panel participants will be announced on Playa at the Artery.
print_description: A panel discussion about the inspiration, challenges and unique creative vision of Burning Man Art by artists who create it. Audience Q&A to follow.

title: Burning Man Ultramarathon: 50k
description:
The Burning Man Ultramarathon will be a true test for the hardcore runners: in the desert, in the middle of the crazy, wonderful, hot, sandy, sweaty Burning Man festival, runners will face a series of loops around the perimeter, past The Man and The Temple, past various artwork, through part of the main camp of Burning Man to run 50 kilometers (31 miles). The race will take place on Wednesday, September 1st, starting at 5 a.m. (with mandatory race meeting at 4:45 a.m.).

Participants can attire themselves however they would like (the more entertaining, the better), but should wear running sneakers (or Vibrams, if that's how you roll), and MUST carry at least one bottle of water. There will be 2-3 aid stations with water and running snacks (and we welcome volunteers to help dispensing the water and assist the runners with cheers, hydration, snacks, and sweaty hugs -- please contact me if you'd like to volunteer!), and runners can leave drop bags at the main aid station. All finishers will receive finishers' medals and lots of love.

*Burning Man 50k Website:*


*Facebook Event:*
http://www.facebook.com/#!/ event.php?eid=174362476725& ref=ts <http://www.facebook.com/#%21/ event.php?eid=174362476725& ref=ts>

Please pass on this information to any runner you know. Volunteers and pacers are needed! We'll be having art cars along the course to spray people down. I anticipate most runners taking between four and eight hours to finish the run. People can contact me with any questions.
print_description: The Burning Man Ultramarathon will be a true test for the hardcore runners: 50 kilometers on a loop course. Run or just cheer on the runners!

title: Burning Slam! - A Playa Poetry Slam
description:
Born in Chicago in the 80's, and a far cry from the civilized quiet Tuesday afternoon readings in back corners of libraries that you may have in mind when someone says "poetry", a poetry slam is a rowdy competition where the emphasis is on performance, entertainment and audience participation. Five judges will be placed in the audience and will give you a score out of 10 based on audience reaction. Poets job is to win over the audience.

A poem can be whatever you want it to be – a story, a rant, a social commentary, a personal confession. It can be funny, sexy, bizarre, political, truth or complete BS, whatever – provided that you follow a few simple rules, explained below.

-	Poems must be original material by the person who is performing
-	Poets get 3 minutes at the microphone. Points deducted for going over time
-	There will be two rounds. 12 poets in first round, 5 in second
-	No instruments or props allowed. Costumes should be kept to a minimal
-	Poems that attack others on basis of race, gender, religion, sexual orientation or any other form of discrimination will not be tolerated and you will be disqualified

The event will begin at 5pm on Friday evening at Couch Burners Camp – 5.00 and Florence. This will be a fun event and the audience is encouraged to participate. Feel free to bring shakers, clappers, bells, whistles and other noise makers.

So now I am just in need of poets to compete! Step up, bring your mad poetry skills and an attitude and see you if you can walk away with the title of Black Rock City Burning Slam Grand Champion (and hopefully some prizes that I’m trying to source). Send me an email if you’re interested in competing. ajsiggie@gmail.com  I’m also in need of judges, so let me know if you would like to involved that way. 

See you on the Playa, where words become legends.

Peace
PrairieKiwi
print_description: Couch Burners are hosting a poetry slam at 5pm Friday. A poetry slam is a poetry competition with emphasis on performance and entertainment.

And give very serious love to those of us still fighting every day to squeeze every drop of joy out of life that we can. Because we cherish like you wouldn't believe.

title: Camp Counselor: Remedies for Metropolitan Life
description: Metropolitan living got you down? Too many buzzing lights and blinking noises causing static in your noggin? Swarming populace and urgent obligations stressing you out? Using the most cutting edge psychodiagnostic techniques--from electrophrenology to semi-structured interrelational objectification--our crack team of counselors will find the perfect label for what ails you. You might be suffering from multiple chemical insensitivity or having a playa identity crisis. Perhaps you could use some playa career counseling. Whatever's got you down, Camp Counselor has an array of treatment options to get you back on track to successful modern living.

title: Capoeira
description:
Capoeira is an afro-brazilian martial art developed in Brazil during the era of slavery. Afro-brazilians camouflaged this martial art with elements of dance and music in order to hide the combative
purpose of Capoeira from white slave owners. In this workshop we will teach Capoeira through movement and music.

title: CareFactorNil's Lip Dub Music Video Project
description:
I did a "lip dub" music video (well 4) for my girl as a present. Except I thought I was doing something original, but it turns out a lot of people do this. I wanted to do another couple and so I thought, where better than at Burning Man? So if you want to be part of it (probably only 1 line per person or group) then come and join me under the Man. I'll be wearing a "Cheese Coat", which will hopefully be unique. Should only take a minute or so of your time. After the event I'll edit the video together so it's like one whole music video with everyone lipsynching and then post on youtube for you to see and share with friends.
Songs to be finalised, but expect one to be The Dandy Warhols "Bohemian Like You".
If you've no idea what I'm on about, check out the ones I did for my girl and you'll get the idea:
http://www.youtube.com/user/carefactornil71#p/u
print_description: A "lip dub" music video project where I video YOU singing (mime) a line from a song. I'll then edit it all together and post for all as a video gift!

title: Carolina & Matt's Playa Wedding
description:
Carolina Veloso and Matthew Schmidt would love to share the ceremony of our love together with all of the wonderful extraordinary people in our lives who helped to make our relationship possible by surrounding us with so much beauty, joy, and love.

***WE ASK EVERYONE TO WEAR WHITE***

We will be meeting at the Rooftop Camp (AKA "Animus") in NYrvana village at approximately 5:30pm on Thursday September 2nd. There will be two waves of a procession leaving about 6pm going out to the Temple where the ceremony will be. The men will leave first and the women a few minutes later. (So as not to reveal the bride to the groom too soon).

The ceremony will take place at the Temple hopefully around 6:30pm.

If anyone would like to do anything special during the ceremony please let us know.

Afterward we will be heading to an as yet determined camp (maybe Kostume Kult?) for the afterparty. We'd love to have everyone there to share our joy and some surprises and hopefully bring out all of your best performance skills and talents to help create a magical evening!

THE BACHELOR/BACHELORETTE PARTY:

Will be Tuesday night, August 31st. We'll probably start at Rooftop Camp for drinks then head out and find some sexy places to party, but nothing is certain yet. We just hope all of you will come out for some delicious debauchery and fun and get us into lots of trouble before we tie the knot. More details when we get them.


OTHER EVENTS:

We will be doing some last minute crafting and preparations during the week before the ceremony, especially Wednesday at Rooftop Camp, so feel free to check in with us if you'd like to lend a hand and some artistic skills.

**ALSO**!!!!!

*Is anyone not planning on arriving at Burning Man until Tuesday or Wednesday or even Thursday? If so, we have a very special, very important mission for you if you'd like to accept it! Please let us know!

Many many X's and O's,
-Carolina & Matthew
print_description: WEAR WHITE! & celebrate Carolina Veloso & Matt Schmidt's love at their playa wedding.  Procession leaves Rooftop Camp at 6pm.  Temple ceremony 6:30pm.

title: Casting event: make sculpture on a giant Dragon

title: CASTING WORKSHOPS @ DRAGON SMELTER
description:
1.) MOLD MAKING WORKSHOPS
The first aspect of using the Dragon Smelter is creating the sand molds to cast art.  2 workshops will occur on playa at the DS (see ARTeries Location map) in the late afternoon @ 5:30 p.m. Tues, 08/30  and  Thurs, 09/02.  It last 2 hours, involves using steel frames, art “story” boards, sand & binder in a mini-cement mixer and pressure setting sand to create negative mold images & forms to cast into.   

2.) Large Casting Events:
5  p.m. to 7 p.m,  Wed. 09-01 & Fri. 09-03 @ Dragon Smelter 
The large casting events involve DS team members plus you, volunteers from BRC “walk-ups”.  We will fire the smelter kiln to 1900 degrees, deposit recycled aluminum cans in the crucible, then pour the melted contents into the sand molds to create relief sculptures. 

3.) METROPOLIS COINAGE 
The small coin smelter is a minature DS. small furnace, crucible and cast iron coin dye which is light and totally mobile.  We will be operating this during the big casting events at the DS & also daily @ different locations around Burning Man. Check with ARTERies for our daily location if you wish to participate, make yourself a coin on other than big casting event days.  This coin is a gifting to reward recycling by all citizens of BRC & also to celebrate the work of Recycle Camp in taking our aluminum cans every year, turning them into funding for Paiute Tribe youth education. For those who participate in this effort, bring their aluminum cans to Recycle Camps we want to convert one or two of them into a “Metropolis Coin” as a gift to reward your effort. 2 to 3 members of our Dragon Smelter team will operate this little machine daily making coins with or for you.


4. P.M. PLAYING WITH FIRE

Dragon Smelter spits flames from it’s mouth and tail. You can participate in running these effects at night with us.  Come to the DS when you see them start up.  Our team will show you how to safety set these shooting flame affects off.
</html>
print_description: 3 free, open workshops in recycling aluminum scrap & cans into cast art to attend &/or actually participate in if you sign a safety release.

title: CHILI FEED
description: Welcome Home.  Once again, "Chiliman of the Playa" and his team of experts return to the Playa.  Experts in what, I'm not sure;  but they're experts in something.  By Wednesday, for those of you that have been surviving on trail mix, melted chocolate bars, or completely forgot that food was an essential part of surviving in Black Rock City, the though of a home cooked cup of chili might sound pretty good.  It's worth the walk or ride over to "The Bust Stop" located at 8:15 and Hanoi (West Side).  Wednesday, at 4:00 PM we'll be serving up cups of our now highly popular Playafied Chili. Stop by but consider being a little early.  Last year 327 campers enjoyed our gift which is "First Come - First Serve".  We look forward to joining many of our old friends and meeting new ones.   (Nevada State Health Division temporary food permit will be on-site).

title: CRITICAL DICKS !!!
description:
Come join us for the celebration of a Decade of Dicking !!
We have a VERY special treat in hand for what should be the BIGGEST march yet !!.

The Critical Dicks March began as a natural male response to the glorious annual Critical Tits bike ride, which of course is a take-off on the famous Critical Mass bike ride, which in turn is a pun on the nuclear physics term for the amount of a radioactive substance required to begin spontaneous nuclear fission, which was discovered by a bunch of scientists like Albert Einstein, who, for the most part had DICKS. (OK, Marie Curie was a notable exception, but she was HOT. Talk about a nuclear family!) So ya see, what comes around, goes around. 

The Critical Dicks March welcomes all genders: Male, Female, Transsexual, Intersexual, Pansexual, Gay, Bi, Straight, and Bent. However, if you are not naturally blessed with a dick, please bring a long a reasonable fucksimile. 
CRITICAL DICKS is a MARCH, not a bike ride, but if you must bring your bike, we have people who will properly guard your bike until you return for it.
The March starts at noon on Thursday, directly in front of the Man.

And now, let the testosterone flow! Stand proud and erect as you march through the streets of Black Rock City! Cast of the cruel duds of oppression! You have nothing to lose but your shame!
print_description:
That's right, Critical DICKS !!!
The Critical Dicks March begins at Noon on Thursday, Directly in front of the Man(Where else?)
Come Join Us !!!

title: "Cosmic Singing" with Janis Kelly
description:
The Werbeck Technique (www.waldorfmusic.org), based on the work of Swedish artist Valborg Werbeck-Svärdström, is a spiritually enlivened interpretation of the processes involved in singing.  In this interactive workshop, we will work toward developing knowledge of the essential nature of song and summon our "spiritual forces" to assist us as we endeavor to discover our true voices--in all their wonderous purity!  Deceptively simple yet remarkably effective, the Werbeck Technique is the perfect method for every aspiring singer--regardless of age or experience level--and offers lifelong vocal health, longevity, range and FREEDOM!

Lead by Werbeck Technique practitioner Janis Kelly (www.janis-kelly.com), a professional musician, music educator, singer-songwriter, recording artist and "Musical Emissary" from Boulder, CO, "Cosmic Singing" is an opportunity to let your voice "come out and play" in a safe, supportive, semi-structured setting!  In Janis' own words, "...even though I studied voice extensively, directed choirs for years and sang professionally for my entire adult life, I never considered teaching voice lessons or coaching singers until I discovered this method.  It--quite literally--allowed me to discover my voice's true potential and has changed my approach to singing at depth."

Come on out and let the cosmos sing through you!
print_description: "Cosmic Singing" is a workshop based on the Werbeck Technique, which allows aspiring singers of all levels to discover and unleash their true voices!

title: Costuming Giveaways
description:
Kostume Kult has been "costuming the naked" since 2002 from our Esplanade Kostume Dome every day from Tuesday through Saturday Noon til 5pm-ish.  Acquired over the past year from generous costume companies and burners around the world intent to recycle past glory, we have over 1 ton of costumes to give away, all free (no barter or returns required) but note that you MUST wear what you take and walk the runway to be reborn onto the playa with a new look and attitude.

It is important to note that, in line with BM's decommodification, gifting and immediacy principles, Kostume Kult's costume giveaway dome is not about giving products but empowering experiences.  It is true that the sight of a dome full of free costumes makes eyes dilate, pulses quicken and drooling has been known to occur, but we request that you fight the consumerist urge to "acquire"-- to grab armfuls of stuff, to scurry away with thoughts of future times to wear or how there are others you want to supply.  Instead we suggest that you stay in the moment, put something on that makes you feel special and that if you find something absolutely perfect and you see someone else admiring it, please consider taking it off and giving it to them. Playfulness, kindness and generosity are the coins of our realm and we hope you will share.

Come by to participate and, if you have stuff to donate, please drop it off on-playa early in the week or, better yet, ship it to our Davis, CA logistics hub by contacting Maria and David at squamazon@gmail.com to get the details.
print_description: Kostume Kult costumes the needy from noon-5ish every day from our Esplanade Kostume Dome.  All free but you must wear what you take & walk the runway!

description:
All women and girls: decorate yourself and join your sisters on a raucous topless bicycle joyride around the playa!

title: Critical Tits Volunteer Gathering
description:
Learn tools of calm presence, clear boundaries and open hearts needed to hold the ritual space for the women of Critical Tits. Men and Women welcome as Volunteers. This year, once again, the Critical Tits Ride will lead to a Women's Only Ritual on the open playa. The volunteer's role is to create and hold the ritual - by welcoming all on their bikes, marking the edge of the Ritual Ring with your bodies and amplifying its sacred nature with your intention of honor and respect for the Goddess in all women - no small task, eh!! 

This is an essential job to the success of the ritual and the CT Crew is full of gratitude for your participation in this way. During the Ritual, all who join us to hold space along the edge of the Ritual Ring will be asked to face outward, away from the dance towards the open playa. It is no sign of disrespect to you. This desire comes from the intention to create as safe a haven as possible for every woman present. Dancing in a circle of 'watching' individuals could be extremely daunting to some women. 

Our highest intention is to create safety for the most vulnerable in our midst. We are also inviting you to ask all looky-loos and active photographers to be respectful as well – either practicing camera rule #1 of ‘ASK FIRST’ or better yet inviting them to put down their cameras, turn their backs and join you along the sacred edge. 

Gathering at the pre-ritual training gives all an opportunity to learn possible new tools of communication as wells as to build the connections between you that will hold the women of CT with love and integrity. This job calls for BIG hearts and grounded spirits, and we know you are out there! 

We need volunteers, as well, for set up/clean up, bike parking, and drumming. If you want to get involved, contact us at info2010(at)criticaltits(dot)com.
print_description: Learn tools of calm presence, clear boundaries and open hearts needed to hold ritual space for the Women of Critical Tits.  For Men and Women.

title: Daily clearing
description:
This all day every day game consists of two or more people getting together and speaking on what, if anything, is distracting us from this present moment. Thoughts of the past and the future, however valid, can sometime detract from our experience of this NOW moment. This clearing process opens the space to speak these thoughts and be heard, so that we are able to let them go and be in full enjoyment of the moment. While also being mindful of what is important to us as well. 
Through a series of three questions we, Camp Gratitude, intend to guide Burners back to enjoying the precious time we have here at Burning Man. 
The first question is usually along the lines of "What are you present to" followed by "While you are present to that how do you feel?" With the listener recreating what they heard back to the speaker, so there is a clear understanding and reflection for the person being cleared. After that there are two "Questions of the Day." The first QotD is directed towards an aspect of our ego or shadow side, and bringing it into light. By being conscious of these processes, and how we feel while present to them, we can work through them and utilize them.
print_description: A process of being present. Through dialog we help clear our being by unloading thoughts and troubles that might keep us from being totally in the NOW

title: Deliverator training
description:
Our friendly, uniformed bike messengers have served our community with playa-wide delivery services for your missives, parcels, letters, schwag since 1999. 

This year we are recruiting the stout of heart and the sturdy of sinew to join our legions of deliverators.

Drop off what you wish to be delivered at camp Black Rock Spatial Delivery along with the recipient's name and address.  Or write your message on one of our Burning-Man-themed postcards.

Would you like to spread joy throughout the playa and meet lots of grateful people?  Help us deliverate!  Training everyday Tuesday-Friday at 11am.  Recommended: bring a bike or other form of transportation.

title: dixième
description:
The city has a shadow. Not an underside, but an Otherside. A Shadowground crisscrossed by phantom alleyways that twist between the no-longer, the never-ever and the farthest reaches of your imaginings. The dwellers here are myths and legends, only real to dreamers, only found when lost. Only in such a place can broken toys come to life. only in such a place do marionettes come to wander...

We are the Wandering Marionettes, a Los Angeles based dance, circus and performance art troupe blending circus-freak and goth-punk aesthetics with hip-hop moves and attitude, creating a truly unique, dark and mysterious glamour certain to mesmerize and inspire.

The Wandering Marionettes and Special Guest performers join creative forces with Muse and the Happenstance Clan to bring you an unforgettable evening of performance and music.  Start time 9 pm, Friday evening.  Before the show starts at 9:30 explore Muse, a three story pagoda that will house the Marionettes (and friends) and all their interactive environments!

visit us at: http://www.wanderingmarionettes.net/
print_description: The Wandering Marionettes and Special Guests invite you to join us under Muse for a night of performance and music. Start time 9 pm, Friday evening.

title: DMV Happy Hour
description: Please join the Hotties in celebrating the end of another successful day at the Department of Mutant vehicles. This is a great opportunity to meet the Hotties and Mutant Vehicle creators. Bring your night-licensed MV and party with us as we raise a glass or two to Black Rock City's fantastic art on wheels. This is a great time to see loads of MV's together in their night time splendor. Also, after the party this is THE place to catch a ride on one of the Mutant Vehicles as they drive off for the rest of the night. This event is open to all citizens of BRC. (MV owners, please park your vehicle across the Esplanade in front of the DMV)

title: Dodgeball!
description:
Do you like balls on your face?  Then you probably wouldn't be very good at this! 

Unlike a growing number of educational institutions, dodgeball is still part of the P.E. curriculum at Gigsville High. It's the safest course we offer!

Balls provided, but feel free to bring extra.  Bring plenty of water!

Meet at Fabulous Disaster in Gigsville.  We'll be the group of idiots itching to pelt each other (and you!)

title: Dreaming the Future Metropolis
description:
On WEDNESDAY (Permaculture and Eco/Living) - "Come join other eco visionaries, green builders, and futurists to discuss various approaches to Green and eco living now and in the future. What does it mean to really be "Green" in the city? How can we translate the best of Green Thinking into Future Urban Spaces?"

On THURSDAY (Authentic Spirituality) - "Come share your ideas for authentic spirituality as is manifests for both the indivdual and community. What does spirituality mean in light of our current urban world? How can we spiritually enrich our lives together in the Metropolis of the future?"

ON FRIDAY (Health and Diet in Today's World) - "Join us in a panel discussion sharing the different diets and healthy ways of living in today's society and in conscious communities. Resources, health tips, what makes one diet the right kind for you, and more will be shared with this interactive panel of health conscious presenters".
print_description: Discussion and panels on topics including: green urbanism, permaculture, alternative community models, green economics, etc. BRING YOUR IDEAS!!

title: Dream Interpretation Workshop
description:
Dreaming is an important part of consciousness.  Our dreams can tell us key messages about our lives, relationships, jobs, and spiritual journeys.  This workshop will utilize a powerful and unique dream interpretation methodology to unlock the meaning of your Playa dreams.  
Come prepared with your dream written down, or jot down your dream at the workshop.  Jadene Mayla will walk you through the process step-by-step, and you will emerge from this workshop with a message just for you that the Playa has sent directly through your subconscious mind.
print_description: Our Playa dreams contain rich insights.  Our subconscious communications with our conscious minds are telling us something.  Let's find out what.

description: Strut your Playa friendly, Eco-Fabulous Re-Fashioned Playa-wear. All are invited to participate! So pull out those sewing machines, that box of pins! title: Ecstatic Dance w/DJ Source
description: Ecstatic Dance is an inner/outer journey of moving meditation. It is a letting go of self-imposed ideas that restrict movement and is an opening to new ways of expression with the body through motion. It develops a direct body-spirit connection in dance. Let your body and inner guide be your teachers. This is about being present with your own energy and discovering your own dance within. Use this movement and energetic experience to release stuck patterns in body, emotions, mind and spirit.
print_description: Ecstatic Dance is an inner/outer journey of moving meditation. Use this movement/energetic experience to release stuck patterns in body/mind/spirit.

title: Effectively Co-Creating Entheogenic Community
description: There is great change upon the wind, a paradigm shift the likes of which humanity has never witnessed before. We can all sense it. We can feel it in our very bones, calling from the depths of our collective psyche as we draw ever closer toward what Terrance McKenna referenced as the “eschaton”, the ultimate transcendence from a cultural worldview of Logos (Creative Word) to Holos (Holistic & Collective Conscious Evolution). As we move into the New Millenium, facing the apparent and inevitable collapse of old paradigm structures, it becomes ever more vital for us, both individually and as a species, to recognize the fundamental importance of our unified state of existence both spiritually and as conscious co-creators within the Gaian/Human collective. Toward that end, tryptamines, both endogenous and exogenous, provide us all with a unique opportunity and ability to recognize and noetically realize that unified state of universal consciousness that intimately connects us all, to each other, to all of nature and to Source itself. Through the entheogenic experience we can effectively open our hearts and minds to literally limitless possibilities for fostering harmony, beauty, peace, sustainability and greater economic and environmental efficiency, that will allow us as a species to not only survive but thrive upon our planet in the establishment of the age old vision of the Universal Brother/sisterhood of all Humankind. How can the noetic revelations that the tryptamine experience serve us in this process? Come and join Hal Lucius Nation from the Temple of Awakening Divinity in this enlightening and engaging forum where we will collectively envision and discuss these possibilities.
print_description: How can the noetic revelations engendered through the tryptamine experience serve us in this process of planetary transcendence? Find out!

title: EFT Trauma Clearing
description: Color-Sound-Touch meridian tapping blended with Deeksha blessing. Color-Touch-Sound, Emotional Freedom Techniques, and Compassionate Breathwork, combine to clear trauma, acute and chronic pain, addictions, guilt, shame, blame, fear, phobias, and limiting beliefs from our consciousness and nervous systems. Providing access to Emotional Intelligence, forgiveness, right action, right relationship, freedom, fun, ecstasy, deep peaceful sleep, abundant energy, love, appreciation and bliss! This profound work clears trauma on the cellular level beyond where logical mind may have thought an issue was completely cleared and healed. People report having profound, lasting healing and feeling the best they ever have in their life! title: Ein Hammer Nightime Opertation
description: Beneath a giant sledge hammer, moving industrial images of frantic workers are visible through skylights on the ground, suggesting the enormous power turbines underneath the city need a "bump start". Infinity mirror tunnels, whirling roof vents and a submerging conveyor belt filled with tools for the workers below completes the vision. Three regular-sized sledgehammers are the tools for interaction. When a participant slams one down on their target, a deep, audible "boom" shakes the ground, feet, ankles, etc. The more simultaneously the three hammers are struck, the higher the tongues of flame travel up the giant hammer itself. If the three participants get the flames all the way to the top, the hammerhead spins with liquid fire, unfolds, and reflects shafts of light downward like an infernal disco ball as the underground turbines audibly groan up to speed. Strength and accuracy matter not-- it's all in the timing. Ein Hammer is a tribute to workers as one.
print_description: Beneath a giant sledge hammer, 3 participants are given their own to strike targets resulting in huge bursts of flame. Hint: It's all in the timing.

title: Even Gandhi Got Hungry and Buddha Got Mad!
description: With work, kids, chores and cell phones, how do you maintain your spiritual integrity? It's easy to express your spirituality when life is going the way you want it to, but what happens when your days are not long enough, your car breaks down, and your significant other is driving you crazy? It is the challenge of the modern day seeker to find his or her spiritual "center" in the middle of "everyday chaos".  You are about to discover the secrets to making everyday the spiritual adventure it is meant to be and living the glorious gift of your very own life.  Breakthrough your own dis-empowering stories once and for all and create the life you truly desire!  Now is the time! Based on the book "Even Gandhi Got Hungry and Buddha Got Mad! by Nanice Ellis. This class/workshop will change your life!  Bring a Friend. Taught by Nanice Ellis - Global Facilitator of Peaceful Awakening, Host of "Chai with Nanice" on LATalkRadio.com and GODERGY on BBS Radio, International Life Coach, Healer and Author of 7 Inspirational Books.
print_description: Changing the Story of Your Life! Breakthrough your own dis-empowering stories once and for all and create the life you truly desire!

title: Evening contradance
description:
Contradance every night until dancers or musicians quit (starts after sunset or after burns Sat Sun). Live music - didj, electric fiddle; looped/ trad'nal/ celtic/ fusion/ techno. Fast paced but easy to learn.  We will cycle through different levels - you won't have to wait long for beginner level w/ lessons.  (And there will be a neighboring dance area for those who prefer to freestyle.)  A caller instructs but there is room for dancers to improvise. 1/2 the moves w/ your partner, 1/2 w/ everyone else. No need to bring a partner (dancers swap partners after every dance).  Zen is flow, synchrony, bonding (not footwork, not competition).  If you are smiling, you are doing it right. 

Because couples flow through one another in long lines and end up interacting with everyone, it has a very tribal feel–w/ bonding through synchronous stomping, clapping and hooting.  It is very playful (variations and flourishes improvised ad lib) and flirtatious.  Dancers typically include all ages from children to the elderly, and include people with a surprising range of disabilities.  Dancers and callers frequently swap gender roles, and playfully mock gender conventions.

The caller gives instructions for each dance's particular repeating cycle of ~10 moves.  The basic moves are very easy to learn, but lessons are necessary for advanced moves, and so that new dancers don't become disoriented, and can more quickly get to the point of enjoying the flow.  We will use a LCD projector and screen to get dancers up to speed as quickly as possible.  While the caller explains individual moves and line movement verbally, the screen will show them diagrammatically from above, and w/ POV video of real dancers from the side.   

Slippery shoes are helpful.  A less than full stomach will make it easier for some to avoid dizziness.  Dancers expect to adjust their behavior to suit each person they meet in the line (e.g. just ask for minimal spinning or whatever else makes you comfortable).
print_description: Live music - trad'nal/celtic/fusion/techno. Fastpaced but easy to learn. Called instruction,add improv. Zen is flow, synchrony, bonding (not footwork)

title: Eye Gazing & Ecstasy with Michael
description:
Eye Gazing & Ecstasy with Michael
We all know that the eyes are the window of the soul. Are you walking around with the curtains to these windows closed to the world?

In this eye-opening workshop, you will learn the history and evolution of eye contact, and then you will receive practical instruction on how to improve the quality of your eye contact, with friends, loved ones, lovers, and even strangers, for fostering intimacy, connectedness, and trust. 

For the second half of the workshop, you will have the opportunity to experience for yourself the interconnectedness, trance, ego dissolution and ecstasy that can come from deep, prolonged gazing into another's eyes, as a meditative practice. Sages, yoginis, dakinis, mystics and poets throughout the ages--including Rumi--have seen eye gazing as one of the most powerful and subtly erotic experiences two humans can share. Come experience this power for yourself.
print_description: We all know that the eyes are the window of the soul. Are you walking around with the curtains to these windows closed to the world? Open your eyes!

title: Fire Idol IV
description:
Q:  How do you challenge an elite fire performer?
A:  Heckle the crap out of them, of course! 

Fire Idol returns for its fourth year on the playa, with even more fire, heckling and insanity. This event is so extreme it can only be contained by Death Guild’s Thunderdome! A parody of the T.V. show “American Idol” Fire Performers will compete for Fire Trophies by surviving their elimination round, only to come face-to-face with our three Fire Idol Judges in round two.  As always, our judges appreciate bribes. 

 Round One:  4 men enter. One man leaves.  As always, women are welcome and encouraged to compete. Spin your hearts out to really bad music, while being heckled by our M/C and Fire Idol judges.

 Round Two: One man enters. Alone. Your mission: to survive the intense tongue lashing from our Judges with your dignity, ego and sense of humor intact. Top three winners are gifted mini-thunderdome fire (propane) trophies.

 Bring your gear (and your balls).  We’ll provide the fuel (white gas only). Signups begin 1/2 hour prior to the event at Death Guild’s Thunderdome.

 Warning:  this event is for immature audiences only.  Pansies, cry-babies, the truly untalented, and those with fragile egos need not apply.  On second thought, maybe this is exactly what you need!  Come on down.

“Congratulations. You're the first to survive the audition…”
Aunty – Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
print_description: Fire Idol returns for its 4th year. A parody of the T.V. show American Idol - on Fire! Signup 1/2 hour prior to the event at DeathGuild’s Thunderdome.

title: Flaming Tetherball
description:
Come on down for a round of flaming tetherball. Find a myself (mr. dug) or a fellow bat so we can lend you a pair of welder's gloves and light up. Instead of hitting the ball as in traditional tetherball, you are encouraged to grab the ball and throw or swing it. Keep your wits about you, this is real fire. Aggressive play can result in the whole thing tipping over, so go easy. 

We have optional face shields which are great if you get hit in the face, but they tend to fog up and are generally less than comfortable. If you have a suggestion for improved face protection, we welcome ideas. 


People always ask how you win. Personally, I think if you're playing, you've already won. But if you simply must sort out a winner, a point is scored when you wrap the chain all the way around the pole till it can't go any further. Your opponent tries to stop that by trying to do the same thing in the opposite direction. How many points? Whatever. 

And feel free to pass the ball on to a friend before the fire burns out, because it's important that we let the ball cool down over a shot of whiskey in between burns.
print_description: Come on down for a round of flaming tetherball. Find a myself (mr. dug) or a fellow bat so we can lend you a pair of welder's gloves and light up.
