title: Free Your Mind
description:
“It is NOT events that bother us, but OUR THOUGHTS about those events.” - This participatory and experiential workshop will bring you freedom from our stressful thoughts. Thoughts like… “People should appreciate me more. My parents should have been more available. I’m missing my life mission.” … these thoughts can run undetected in the background of our mind and sap our energy and enthusiasm. When I think “no one likes me” then I don’t return phone calls, I don’t initiate conversations and thus I bring about the exact thing which I believe. 

Using group work, guided meditation, and written exercises, this workshop will show you how to make friends with the mind. We will create an atmosphere of open, honest and authentic communication to allow participants to feel safe to explore thoughts that they are ashamed of. I believe that every thought has a valuable gem of wisdom to offer us and the workshop is a playground for looking at how that is true.
print_description: “It is NOT events that bother us, but OUR THOUGHTS about those events.” - This participatory/experiential workshop will bring you freedom!

title: French Maid Brigade Parade
description: Oui, Black Rock City is now a metropolis, but despite all zee efforts of zee ingenious DPW and zee prostrations of zee Black Rock Rangers, it’s still dusty here. Zee role of zee French Maid is still as vitally important as ever. Join Black Rock's favorite team of sexy, clean freaks: we expect to see you in uniform. Please bring: non-feather dusters, rags, dustbusters, service carts, vacuums, white gloves, latex gloves, enema kits, lube, any other useful cleaning equipment, and your worst possible French accent. We meet at 3 O’Clock and Esplanade then dust our way through every filthy, nasty camp on our march toward zhat dust bucket known as Center Camp Café, liberate them from their dusty oppression, and celebrate our triumph!

title: Furniture Car Rally - 17th annual Disco Ball Rally
description:
Welcome home everybody!  Please don’t make plans Thursday evening except to join our amazing friends, lovers, strippers, porn stars, talent scouts, and the super sexy Checkered Flag Girls for the adventure of a lifetime!

The fabulous and amazingly handsome dynamic DUOS of luxury and adventure cordially invite YOU to join US in the 17th annual Furniture Car Disco Ball Rally!!!  Led by the creator, designer, and drivers of the world famous “WOW Couch Car” which is soon be featured in Architectural Digest!!!  WHAT EVERY... right!!!  WE want YOU and YOUR FRIENDS to join US.. Furniture Car Rally Camp, in OUR DISCO BALL RALLY (maybe to the death) ACROSS THE PLAYA and BACK!!!

YOU will never see THIS again....  until next year!!! Make new friends and bring your sexy selves to our camp.  On your way bring every Couch Car, Lazy Boy, Lazy Susan, Grand Father Clock, Tiki Bar, Dance Floor, Stripper Pole, Hot Tub Vehicle (HTV) or anything furniture you can sit on/in/at/up and drive IT to OUR RALLY!!!  Or just bring yourself!!!  We love YOU!!!  If this isn’t the most Amazing Race you’ve ever seen... please follow US around ALL NIGHT and make US wrong and show US what the hell a good time IS!!!

Wear your biggest and brightest playa disco outfit and follow the “Disco Ball” IF YOU CAN!!!

YOU WILL win fabulous PRIZES, but YOU must be in IT.... to WIN IT!!!  
(Furniture Car = IT)
 
Registration Begins:               5-6pm 
Race Rally Briefing:               6-7pm
Race Begins promptly:           7-8pm to receive: RALLY MAP
Race End:             Winners Only Pancake Breakfast 8 am Friday

Pre-Registered FURNITURE CARS receive a FREE in camp Strip-O-Gram before the race @ BurningMan.  On-Line Pre-Registration will end on: August 27, 2010 – midnight.
 
Please see website http://mobilesofa.com for rules and rally details.

WARNING LABEL PRODUCTIONS:  Adult Only Event. Please leave children, firearms, stabbing weapons, explosives, and small furry animals at home.

PS. We are no way affliated with that crazy group of politico's called The Tea party! But if you want to dress up as a Native american and dump tea onto their heads, that's allowed too!
Eat me!

title: Geocache Event "Cache & Burn III" Home Again!
description:
Geocaching event!! check out GC29YVJ on geocaching.com for the full skinny. Anyhoo, here's a rundown...We will be meeting at 10 am at 6 o'clock and the MAN on Thursday. WE WILL ONLY BE AT THE MAN FOR 15 MINUTES OR SO THEN MOVE THE EVENT TO OUR CAMP UNTIL ????. Keep an eye out on the bulletin boards prior to the event for postings with exact locations to our camp and our meeting location at 6 o'clock and the MAN. It's not very often that we get to meet geocachers from all over the place in our neck of the woods. What could be better than a dusty playa in the Nevada desert? I can't think of anywhere I'd much rather be?
At least a couple of us will be wearing tye died T-shirts with Great Basin Eastern Sierra Geocachers in large white writing on the back. We plan on meeting at the man and then making our way back to Camp Geosmached for Otter Pops and other yummy breakfast libations!

title: Geology of the Black Rock Desert
description: Ever wondered how those amazing land forms all around Black Rock City? Come and learn from Terry Wright, PhD. retired professor of geology from Sonoma State University. His specialty is bringing the latest interpretations of mountain building and plate tectonics to the creative general public. He will focus on the origin of the bedrock units and mountains of the black rock desert in terms of plate tectonics finishing with the recent history of faulting and lake deposits.

title: Get Your Sparkle On
description:
Dark Sparkle is the potent mix of the mysterious and the dangerous that makes something irresistibly attractive.  It's what causes people to push their limits to the point of insanity, what causes nice guys to finish last, that unexplainable quality that pulls people to the dark side. Some days, Dark Sparkle is your alter-ego; other days it is your most natural feeling form. Dark Sparkle is Mona Lisa's smile, biscuits and gravy, the Fonz, the apocalypse. Dark Sparkle is an adventurous way of life--physically, emotionally and mentally that we know citizens of BRC embrace.
Come explore your Dark Sparkle with the ladies and gents of CDS! Pastie making, tassel twirling, crotch-blinging, and some burly-q moves from the resident Vixens.
print_description: Come explore your dark sparkle through conversation, crafting, and canoodling. Featuring pastie making, tassel twirling, and crotch-blinging.

title: Ghost Train

Throughout the festival a projection of a life-sized train slowly moves across the playa creating an infinite train-car canvas for participants to digitally paint with modified spray cans. As participants paint the projected train their work not only appears to move with the train but also reappears randomly on future trains throughout the event.

BYOB and mixers and cup.

Prom wear not only encouraged, but enforced. Yeah, this means YOU.

(for those who have never been to Gigsville before... this is a great event for you. Seriously. We're a very happy, friendly group of people who want to meet you -- especially at times when we've expressly invited you... like NOW! Please come by and have a drink and slow dance for a spell. Warm yourself by our car-b-que... but watch out when someone yells "fire in the hole!")

title: GODERGY: Discover a Personal Relationship with GOD
description:
God plus Energy = Godergy.  If you are ready to Really Meet God on your terms, don't miss this class/workshop.Whether you have left traditional religion and lost your connection with the Divine or are simply looking for a deeper and more meaningful relationship with the Divine, this class/workshop will bring you to the next level and beyond.  Discover God in every day life. Become one with The One and change the way you live. Learn how to talk to God and listen so you can clearly hear God speaking to you. We are living in a Time of Great Awakening. This often means that old spiritual beliefs and old religious doctrines are being questioned and discarded. Many people are left to feel all alone and without any real guidance from above. Where do you find God after you have left organized religion or discovered that your old beliefs don't hold water to the light of a new day?
Godergy is designed to help you create or re-create an intimate relationship with God on your own terms.
Godergy helps you turn the journey inside and connect to the Divine in a way in which only you could connect.
Godergy brings the experience of God to Real Life and shows you how to discover the power within yourself and the power of prayer within God.
Godergy is about the Evolution of Love for Humanity and Offers the Secrets of Spiritual Awakening.
Come and Fall in Love with GOD! Come Early as it fills up quickly! This class/workshop will be taught by Nanice Ellis - Global Facilitator of Peaceful Awakening, Host of "Chai with Nanice" on LATalkRadio.com and GODERGY on BBS Radio, International Life Coach, Healer and Author of 7 Inspirational Books.
print_description: Have you left traditional religion, lost your connection w/ God or are simply looking for a deeper and more meaningful relationship w/ God? Join us.

title: Group and Partner Healing, Including Therapeutic F
description:
The class will focus on the community healing dynamics, honoring the healing power innate within us as individuals, in partnership and as a group.  We will access healing through sounds/silliness/laughter in groupwork and partner work finding partners within the community of the class (not necessarily someone we come with if we come "alone").  We will access healing through breathing and partner stretching and group/partner touch/massage.  Once we are warmed up and comfy cozy, we will embark on therapeutic flying, combining elements of sound healing, touch and mutual support as we journey off the ground and into the air!
The class/workshop will be progressive, in that if participants were to return for more than one class, they will be taught skills that would layer on top of the skills they learned in the previous class even while others were learning more basic flying techniques.  I will have varied community therapeutic exercises so that if someone returns for each class (which would be great!) they will continue to benefit and learn new skills and have new experiences.
print_description: The class will focus on the community healing dynamics, honoring the healing power innate within us as individuals, in partnership and as a group.

title: High Vibration Waves w/Jonathan Horan
description: In the 5Rhythms we dance hard, we dance bold, we dance deep. Jonathan takes us to the place where the soul of hip hop, the catharsis of rock and roll, the trance of techno and the heart of house collide into the world beat. And in this beat, we get together to reinvent ourselves, to discard last week’s fears and move into this week’s dreams. This is our practice. It doesn’t matter where we come from or how we grew up or whether we can or can’t dance. Movement is medicine, and whether we feel clumsy or graceful, it heals us. Real learning happens when we show up and move because the body can’t lie. It lets us know right away if we’re feeling closed or open, fixed or fluid, tight or loose, off or on. We carry so many things, and not just in our backpacks. What do we do with all this repressed stuff, the headtrips that are holding us back, holding us down, and turning us into something we’re not? We dance. We dance with whatever’s going on inside of us and connect with others who are doing the same. Fueled by the ecstatic language of the 5Rhythms, this is movement as spiritual practice, a dancing, kinetic prayer of connection to the unpredictable mystery of it all.
print_description: Fueled by the ecstatic language of the 5Rhythms, this is movement as spiritual practice; dancing, a kinetic prayer of the mystery connecting us all.

title: hip hop Open Mic Live
description:
Part alchemy and part black magic,  FreeStyle Palace is an amalgam of sophisticated and authentic Urban Underground music and culture forged by the heat of the Black Rock Desert and polished by the collective talent of Burning Man Participants. 

We interpret the 2010 Metropolis theme as a tribute and embrace of the Urban Underground experience we have shared with our Burning Man community for the past six years.   

In his discussion of the Metropolis theme, Larry Harvey must have been thinking about FreeStyle Palace when he described “hubs of social interaction” which “generate the pulse of urban life.”  

FreeStyle Palace is a “hub” of many cultures, races and generations.  We produce a steady “pulse” via amplified kick drum and electronic beat.   The “hub” and “pulse” of FreeStyle Palace is a backdrop for Burning Man Participants to create a personal Urban Underground experience like those which radiated from cities both modern and ancient.
print_description: FreeStyle Palace 2010 Stage and microphones are open to all performers, rappers, singers and players for music in the BLM Urban Underground.

Wednesday night at 11pm, dance to breaks, dubstep and house on two sound systems with a variety of silly and sexy experiences scattered about the village... Take part in the furry olympics, visit the horn-polishing booth, meet the horny camp gag-reflexology instructor or propose a horned sideshow attraction of your own.

In Nyrvana Village with Kostume Kult on the Esplanade and Horny Camp on Avenue A, scurry on over for a most entertaining night.  Booze, mixers, ice, bizarre props and twisted inspirations are requested and please bring your own cup. HORNS required for service ;)

Visit Kostume Kult and Horny Camp in the days before for costuming giveaways, and horn-making classes.  If you would like to create a sideshow attraction or have ideas to share please let us know on-playa or at kult@kostumekult.com

title: Human Carcass Wash
description:
Get involved with some of your closest Playa friends and some new friends in trading your old Playa Dust in for a clean body ready to be dusted once again. This event honors your stated boundaries of where you do want to be touched or washed.

Be part of an interactive washing experience.  

The highly regarded and much anticipated... Human Carcass Wash!!! 

You will first participate in helping other Burning Man friends get washed by spraying them with Water, Dr. Bonners Peppermint Soap, washed with plenty of hands by your Playa neighbors, then spayed again with water and squeeged off before you depart for more Playa fun. Bring a water donation to help the process along. 

Hair washing may be available, depending on donated water resources and available PolyParadise members or other Playa friends willing to provide Hair Washing.

title: Human Sound Mandala
description:
Brand UR Ass ‘N More sponsors the first Human Sound Mandala at Burning Man. Held between Esplanade and the Man in empty playa (in line with 4:30), concentric rings of participants consciously come together to form circles with similar sound, such as drummers, chanters, clappers, singers, a band, or whatever. The gong is in the center and begins the flow outward as we all express our uniqueness and togetherness in community.

After we assemble, the gong will play for 5 minutes, then each ring of participants will make joyful sound for 5 minutes in a wave toward the outer ring and back again.

We have the gong, but the mandala depends on YOU to participate. It will appear at 3:00 pm on Thursday and disappear at 4:30.
print_description: BRC citizens form concentric circles with similar sounds such as drummers, singers, chanters, hand clappers, bands - a gong in the center. Bring it!

title: Ian Smith Intermediate poi workshop
description: I will teach very useful variations on one of the most common tricks with poi.  Then go on to introduce weaves in all timing and directions.  This workshop will mostly likely identify holes in your technique, where you can only do the right and not the left ect.
print_description: A deeper study of weaves. I will teach very useful variations on one of the most common tricks with poi.

title: Ian Smith Poi Workshop: Esoteric Poi
description: I will guide this class to the edges of our minds capacity to think about poi as I teach three dimensional technique.  Our minds easily grasp two dimensional concepts ie. timing and direction.  When one does a move that is between two or more timing/directions the mind may get confused or jump between concepts.  My practice of late has been to reside in that in between space without concepts, where I have access to multiple timing/directions at the same time.
print_description: I will guide this class to the edges of our minds capacity to think about poi as I teach three dimensional technique.

title: INTEGRATION: Bring your B-Man Experience Back Home
description: Discover how to bring your Burning Man Experience Back Home! It's easy to uncover your True Self at Burning Man but what happens when you go home? How do you INTEGRATE your real self with your old self?  How do you overcome the resistance of family, friends and those just not ready to evolve? How do you take your Burning Man Transformation and Make it Stick in your everyday world?  If you are ready for True Life Long Transformation, don't miss this workshop.  It is meant for you!  Come Early as it fills up quickly!  This class/workshop will be taught by Nanice Ellis - Global Facilitator of Peaceful Awakening, Host of "Chai with Nanice" on LATalkRadio.com and GODERGY on BBS Radio, International Life Coach, Healer and Author of 7 Inspirational Books.

title: Intentional Massage
description:
This class will show how massage can be enhanced both for the giver and receiver using the techniques of "touch relaxation", "seeing fingers" and "focused intention". Individuals and couples are welcome (you'll pair up for practice either way). The class will emphasize healing rather than sensual massage, but the techniques are equally applicable to both.

1) Touch relaxation: often the receiver is ignored in massage classes, and I think that's a shame, because all of the really important work has to be done by them, and the giver is but a guide and assistant. This technique is based on focused intention to relax in response to touch. The technique is practiced in pairs during the class.

2) Seeing Fingers: I tend to not even bother with my eyes when giving with massages, because all the important things you can perceive you "see" through your fingertips. This is a skill that can only be learned through practice, and it ties in strongly with the previous concept.

3) Focused Intention: I do some practical demonstrations of what happens when your attention (and therefore intention) wanders during massage, then have a discussion and practice regarding how intention shapes all of what you accomplish during a massage. 

In the past, people who have attended, especially massage therapists, have been very appreciative of the emphasis on connection between the the giver and receiver vs. specific techniques.

Taught by Dreamweaver in the 4th Chakra Temple at Sacred Spaces.

I have taught this class with Ascension Tribe several times in the past. I'm self-taught but have been giving and receiving massage for most of my life, and have accumulated my knowledge from a variety of sources, experiential, scientific, and spiritual.
print_description: Touch Relaxation, Seeing Fingers, and Focused Intention will be taught and practiced in pairs. Focus is on healing. Individuals and couples welcome.

title: Ken Hamazaki / Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD
description:
The art performance by Japanese contemporary artist, Ken Hamazaki. This is the 9th Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD- at Burning Man.

This performance was inspired by and arranged from the Japanese traditional tea ceremony. The original ceremony consists of a variety of manners to drink, but to experience this fully, please drink with a style you favor most. The most interesting practice would be turning your thought toward him for a few minutes without speaking and enjoy drinking in this small silent space. 

I always serve this tea for whoever sits down in front of me. Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD- is always a great tool to communicate universally without any thought of hierarchy. I'll be happy if you find any good idea for the future prospect of our metropolis throughout this performance. A big red umbrella will be there as the landmark. GRATEFUL RED!

Furthermore, I will exhibit my works and will serve you the tea again in San Francisco after Burning Man. Please join us when you are free. For more detail, please visit the following links. 

Ken Hamazaki Red Museum
http://www.kenhamazaki.jp

NEW PEOPLE
http://www.newpeopleworld.com

J-POP SUMMIT FESTIVAL
http://newpeopleworld.com/j-pop
print_description: "Would you like a cup of amazing green tea for your break in the sultry desert of Metropolis?"

Starting at Great Balls of Fire, Soulaye will lead a deep playa charge with her 3 kite train equipped with massive tails, perfect for whispy little wind kisses to participants off in the distance! title: Lady Libertine Theatre & Lounge
description:
In our outdoor theatre and indoor lounge, we provide a variety of entertainment throughout the week both day and night so stop by to enjoy! We'll have a vast array of exciting acts including live & electronic music, comedic skits, burlesque, LED/Fire hoop and poi, spoken word, video projection and all around entertainment for the BRC Metropolis masses. 

Our wholesome lounge (no speakeasy here!) will offer a place to relax and enjoy the entertainment with refreshments, while our outer stage can support a mid-sized crowd for the larger acts we will showcase. 

Do you have a performance that might suit our stage? Interested performers should contact Kostume Kult propriators ShiZaru & Morphous, to sign up for available slots if you have an appropriate act to share. See ya' either on stage or in the audience! (but not at the speakeasy. there is no stinkin' speakeasy...)

 will be on hand for any interested parties so do let us know if you have talent to share!

title: Listen to Burning Man Information Radio 94.5FM
description:
BMIR-FM, Burning Man Information Radio (94.5 - FM) is the official radio station of BRC.  Tune in 24 hours a day for music, news, weather, interviews and event announcements.  

We start broadcasting live from the playa on August 25th which is several days before the event opens so while you're at home packing, tune in on the internet at www.bmir.org to find out playa conditions and get any late breaking news.  

We are also BRC's emergency alert system.  If there is an emergency or severe weather tun in for official information and instructions.

Come by Monday-Friday from 12N to 5PM to record an announcement that promotes you or your camps performances and events.  

Don't forget to tune in while your sitting in line at the gate.  We'll be broadcasting live from the Greeters Station and tune in during Exodus for information on how long it may take you to leave BRC.  

We make great entertainment during the hot days while your lazing in your camp with a cocktail.  Tune in or come by and say hello!
print_description: BMIR-FM, Burning Man Information Radio (94.5 - FM) is the official radio station of BRC.  Tune in 24 hours a day for music, news, weather, and more

title: Little Black Dress Parade
description: Come join the annual Little Black Dress Parade, led by the illustrious Burning Band, as we march off down the charmed streets of Black Rock City. Wear your finest little  black dress - no matter your gender - and strut your stuff while the Burning Band provides appropriate and ridiculous musical accompaniment. We will surely be provided with liquid libations along our mystery route through the playa. Meet us at Spanky's Wine Bar at 6:30 PM on Thursday, and stay with us until we drop in our tracks. You can even play with the Burning Band,so bring a random musical instrument or just use your scratchy voice for singing.
print_description: The Burning Band's Little Black Dress Parade, marching and performing in the urbanized desert.

title: Love Your Body -- slow flow yoga
description: A challenging flow (vinyasa) style of yoga, with meticulous attention to alignment and safety, while earnestly and compassionately exploring the mind-body-spirit connection.   A Yoga Alliance registered yoga teacher (RYT-200), Spark received yoga teacher training from Rolf Gates and Baron Baptiste, among others.  He teaches weekly yoga classes at Prana Power Yoga,  Exhale Spa and elsewhere in the Boston area.  Spark also practices and teaches Thai yoga bodywork.    Spark writes:  For me, yoga is the convergence of a lifetime of separate endeavors in self-exploration, self-healing, and self-improvement--from martial arts to philosophy and religion, from Al-Anon to Outward Bound.  Yoga integrates all aspects of my life, helps me find clarity, gratitude and compassion, and offers a growing community of like-minded souls.  Teaching yoga is an opportunity for me to share with others what I have learned so far, to spread the joy and healing that I have found, and to deepen and strengthen my own practice.
print_description: Challenging vinyasa yoga, with meticulous attention to alignment and safety, while exploring the mind-body-spirit connection.

title: Looping Seminar
description:
AUDIOREOLAE...An interactive sculpture/stage/loopstation that allows the participant to create real-time audio loops. Sounds captured may include drumbeats, vocals, guitar melodies or other found sounds. The participant stands under an arch containing speakers, immersed in the sound of their loops, from above and below. The user's figure is framed in a circular opening, a reference to the etymology of the words areola (diminutive form of the Greek word for "open space"), aureole (the traditional "halo" of light around sacred figures in Medieval art) and the literal "audio relay" that is being created. The installation resembles a vertical silver ring, with bamboo fiberglass-clad plywood bases and a semi-transparent fabric covered spaceframe arch, illuminated from within. The looping instructions are very simple, and will be clearly posted. The pedal/trigger will be a large button in the center of the installation, and a 1/4" input, microphone, and electric guitar will be provided. 

The user interface will be very straightforward and minimal. A participant walking by the sculpture with a djembe could -within minutes- be creating her own drum circle, with literally dozens of versions of herself playing in unison. Amateur singers will be able to experience harmonizing to themselves. Guitar players will be able to lay down the chords to their songs and then write BRC-inspired solo melodies.
print_description: Experience the thrill of looping: Bring instruments, drums, found sounds, your voice. Guitar provided. Experience the thrill of looping...

title: Magical Anusara Yoga Class
description: You are invited to join Certified Anusara Yoga teacher Hagar for a magical journey through a forest of yoga. Jump into the sparkly ocean of your being and swim in the beauty of your creativity. This practice will help to restore and sustain your energy for your adventure in Black Rock City, and will offer you a sweet space to step more fully into the process of dissolving into the playa and melt more fully into yourself. No matter how tired you are from the night before, the most exquisite dancer of the universe, your breath, is asking you to party with her, so come and follow her and let your heart unfold!

title: Malvoye The Mentalist
description:
Malvoye the Mentalist: A fully automated antique fortune telling booth, bestows versions and visions of the future. Nightly, Malvoye's powers of mentalism are summoned to give YOU your very own unique and astonishingly accurate fortune. 

Malvoye knows all, Malvoye sees all. 

Seeking love, wealth or the answer to that burning question deep inside you? Each and every reading gives YOU the chance to ask Malvoye your most burning questions. So, come one, come all—put Malvoye to the test! Malvoye's beautiful assistants will instruct you on the proper use of the machine. BUT DO BEWARE, as true fortunes convey more than mere pacifying happiness and positivity. 

Now heard in fully restored Vita-phonic sound! 

A truly unique experience for the citizens of the playa, this Deco 1930's booth was only just recently restored after nearly being lost to time and the elements. The booth, reportedly once part of a now long defunct traveling sideshow, was famous for its uncanny accuracy and genuine powers. In its day, it was said to be the creation of Edgar Cayce (the "Sleeping Prophet") who was somehow able to imbue his power into the booth. It is also said to be the true inspiration for the Tom Hanks's film Big. It is believed to be one of only five Malvoye booths made and the only one known to have survived. It has been painstakingly rewired and restored by a group of burners in the Philadelphia area who happened upon the booth at a local auction and flea market.

***The booth will only be powered and functioning during the times listed though other random nightly hours will be added, especially around the nights of the burns. PLEASE DO NOT attempt to use the booth during other times as you could easily damage it, respect the set boundaries and do not touch the booth.
print_description: Operating nightly, this fully automated antique fortune telling booth bestows versions and visions of your future through the power of mentalism.

title: Miss Black Rock City 2010
description:
Represent your city, your camp, your art, your tent, or just yourself!

Participants (open to all shes, zes, and hes) will reveal their unique inner beauty in 2 categories:

1) The One Minute (no)Talent Competition: No rules, everyone has a talent - be it a stupid party trick or a fine art!

2) Interview: Do they do it for world peace, the children, or for the puppies?

All participants are beautiful and everyone wins by participating.

Please come with a sash and a tiara, and a gift to share with one other participant, via the Beauty Queen Gift Box.  Hosted by StacycatS, the original self-proclaimed beauty queen, in her first on-playa event since 2006!

NOTE: No beauty pageant is fair, bribing the "judges" and your host is encouraged. Participate for fun, rather than play to win!

The MBRC Project has produced events on-playa, around the USA, the UK and Spain since 2004. Check out the Miss Black Rock City website for photos, our theme song, and info on past events.

****************************************
SO, YOU SAY YOU WANT TO BE A JUDGE?

Many people think that being a judge is cool, because of all the
bribes that the judges receive. But are you *really* up to the task?
Show up at the Boutique stage on Wednesday at 4pm SHARP with your
talents and your powers of persuasion in full effect... tardiness is
an anti-bribe! Be prepared to prove yourself to both StacycatS and
the pageant participants! Can you take it like you wanna give it?!

Maybe... if YOU ARE LUCKY... you will be one of five Miss Black Rock
City Judges!

****************************************
print_description: Represent your city, your camp, your art, your tent, or just yourself!  Open to all shes, zes, and hes.
other_location: The pageant will be at the Black Rock Boutique in Center Camp.  Find StacycatS at the Miss BRC headquarters, Eggchtropolis Bar, all week long!

we have a 12' x 24' deck covered overhead with a shade canopy full of over 100 wonderful patio misters, it is consistantly 23 degrees cooler than out on the playa, stop by stay a while rehydrate or just chill.
we will be right next to the Vamp Camp Bar located @ the 7:30 Plaza  
OPEN FROM NOON to SUNSET DAILY. 


during the day this is a very kid freindly place to chill, bring a hula hoop or a chair there will be a hammock available for your use, you can bring some music (I can plug your ipod into my stereo) or perhaps a favorite dish or beverage?? have an exotic or spicy treat?? the owner (MR. Mister) loves spicy food. Come tell a story/ listen to a story, or  just nap?!  a nice place to cool off.   

Please tell all your freinds, this is more of a word of mouth thing as we never seem to make the deadline to get into the printed event directory you receive @ the gate.

title: Nam Myoho Renge Kyo and Intro to Buddhism
description: Join us in our Lotus Dome for the daily recitation of Nam Myoho Renge Kyo and morning gongyo (the practice of chanting two chapters from the Lotus Sutra) In the Lotus Sutra Shakymuni Buddha revealed that every human being can attain enlightment in their present form. Through chanting Nam Myoho Renge Kyo an individual is able to awaken this enlightenment the Buddha revealed and reveal their own buddha nature. A practitioner of this buddhism through chanting and study can transform their life and create a state of unshakable happiness overcoming the sufferings of birth and death. Buddhism is a practice and everyone is welcome to join. Each day after chanting together we will study a buddhist concept, answer questions and share experiences about the practice and its application to our daily life. All are welcome to join us even if you have never chanted before.
print_description: Learn about practicing Buddhism and chant Nam Myoho Renge Kyo & Lotus Sutra with us every morning. Awaken your enlightenment. Everyone is welcome.

title: Naked Yoga by Yoganu.com from London
description: Yoganu is a group for people who want to explore the union of spirituality and sexuality.  We come from the tantric tradition of integrating all of the aspects of ourselves into one being.  Our classes are a combination of dynamic asana (physical postures), pranayama, meditation and partner work.  The intention of each session is to create a space for connection with oneself and with others.  Classes are open to everyone and are sensual and fun.
print_description: Yoganu is a group for people who want to explore the union of spirituality and sexuality.  Classes are open to everyone and are sensual and fun.

Going up, down and all around, have a ball rolling over the Playa strapped inside our giant, inflatable ball.  Take a turn pushing and then be pushed.  It’s a wild ride. You don’t have to take your clothes off to have a good time, but you do if you want to  ride the ZORB. Meet us on the Playa. We start near 6:30 and and end up where we roll. You will recognize our big ball.

title: New Paradigms for Spiritual Evolution
description: World Consciousness is transforming. The way we are waking up and sharing is changing. This workshop will have a lecture/discussion component which details how old religious and discipleship methods are fading and new collaborative and individual paths of awakening are evolving. We will discuss ways that each person can help, and be helped, within our community, to contribute to the positive transformation of each other and the planet. Some interactive finish involving meditation, eye-gazing, small groups or what the moment calls will conclude the workshop. Festival culture will be prominently discussed as a pilgrimage, a community celebration and prayer, and a vortex for energy to uplift the planet. - by Karl Baba
print_description: Explore how old religious methods are fading and new collaborative and individual paths of awakening are evolving and what we can do to shift.

title: Nevada Burners Photo Shoot
description:
Nevada Burners Photo Shoot

Please join your fellow Nevada Burners at 4pm SHARP on Thurdsay, September 2, in Black Rock City at The Man (6:00 side), for a group photo.

Of course, please don your finest what-not as representative of being a Nevadan, and a Burner.

The group photo will be made freely available online following Burning Man.

A party will ensue.

Please bring all your fellow Nevada burner kin and spread the word.

Who: Nevada Burners. No Foreigners!
What: First Lawful Group Portrait
Where: Black Rock City. The Man. 6:00 side.
When: 4:00 pm SHARP
When: 4:00 pm SHARP dammit!
Why: It is written, “...On this day in the 25th year of our Burning Man, after years of coin slots, game shows, and endless ridicule, the tribe known as ‘The Lost Peoples of Nevada’ finally descended once again from their motel rooms and trailer parks, ushering freely and loudly amongst all the other tribes from the uppity world, to that place known among the ancients as Black Rock City, Nevada, ...and in unison, striking a defiant pose before THE MAN!

Download the image freely post-Burning Man here:

tinyurl.com/NevadaBurnersPhotoShoot
print_description:
Nevada Burners Photo Shoot

Please join your fellow Nevada Burners at 4pm SHARP on Thurdsay, September 2, at The Man (6:00 side), for a group photo.

title: Nexus Galaxatron
description: The Galaxatron is the power plant of Nexus. It is a 30 foot glowing dome that draws its energy from the Playa through large pyramid conduits that surround the dome (top secret alien technology) that focus this energy into mega conductors that each plug into the dome. These mega conductors are each programmed to show energy flow through thousands of programmed LED’s; and in the heart of this alien machine lays the Tesla Coil. The Tesla Coil will be battles by Koleman, a pro fire performer! You don't wanna miss this. Located at 10 and Esplanade
print_description: Nexus Galaxatron is a 30 ft dome surrounded by pyramids with all 4 elements. In the heart of the dome lay the giant Tesla coil. Come see the battle!

title: Nomadic Happy Hour
description:
The vision of Camp Nomadia is to bring together as many cool nomadic spirits as we can to share stories, resources, passion, and community. To foster nomadic community, we are hosting a Nomadic Happy Hour on Tuesday and Thursday (4pm to 6pm) and Sunday (3pm to 5pm).

Come and stop by - whether you are a current nomad, future nomad, wanna-be nomad, full-time nomad, part time nomad, domestic nomad, international nomad, technomad, lowtechnomad, former nomad, land nomad, rail nomad, backpacking nomad, open water cruising nomad, friend of a nomad, or you just want to be around nomads.

Bring some food or drink to share, and come mix and mingle. Tour a few truly mobile homes. Learn what it is like to live full-time on the road. Ask questions. Swap stories. Or just come hang out and meet some cool folk.

Camp Nomadia is intentionally unplaced this (our third) year, so check for our on-playa location at Playa Info (and likely on our website as well) and come find us.  Last year we had over 70 nomads from all around the world camped with us, and we are looking forward to another great year in 2010!

BTW -- If you are interested in a life of nomadism, come early on Thursday for our "Technomadic Lifestyle Workshop" just before Happy Hour, running 3pm - 4pm.
print_description: Calling all past/present/future nomads - come find Camp Nomadia and join us for our third annual celebration of living life full-time on the road!

title: Nude Thursday Afternood
description: Drop that costume, grab your birthday suit, and help set the Black Rock City record for semi-spontaneous simultaneous nudity!  It’s easy and it’s fun.  Get nekid with your campmates, your neighbors, and all inhibition free BRC citizens. Participate ANYWHERE you happen to be Thursday afternood.  This event will take place EVERYWHERE on the Playa.  None of that pesky location hunting for us.  Be free.  Be natural.  Be sure to wear your sunscreen.  Be your fabulous naked self.  Be nude all afternoon or at any time between nood and 4pm.  Be There Then.  Official Nudity Inspectors will be in key locations throughout the city to confirm certified rate of nakedness.  Shoes, hats, and bling encouraged as long as they don’t obscure the goods.  Give the gift of your beauty.  Stop by GBOF camp during the week for official “CERTIFIED NAKED” stamp!  The highest seal of nude approval available on Playa.  Fine Print: Participants must be bare-breasted and/or bare-assed to receive stamp.

title: NULUKATUK (BLANKET TOSS)
description: The Inuit of the Arctic use stitched together walrus skins to toss hunters in the air and search out game. The Nulukatuk is done in the whaling communities in the spring if there has been a successful whaling season. It is been part of the whaling feast activity as long as people can remember. With coordinated action by the pullers and the jumper, a person can go as high as thirty feet and land standing up.  Each day at noon the Sooty Brothers from Canada invite you to join in the fun on a "trampoline" made of human springs.
print_description: Each day around noon we invite you to join in this traditional Inuit sport of tossing people high in the air to see what game is afoot!

description:
Retreat from the heat and the dust inside Ocean's Serene Luxury Spa @
Stardust Lounge Casino! We will be pampering our visitors with various lotions and creams to rejuvenate their cracked and tired skin; moisture wipes to clean off that brutal dust and dirt of the Playa; comfortable lounge chairs; some light reading; a
cooling breeze from small, hand-held battery-operated fans; and, of course,
hydration in the form of delicious cold water. Our guests will be able to
adorn themselves with temporary rub-on tattoos as a memento of their visit.

title: On Attaining Buddhahood in this Lifetime
description: What is buddhahood? Is it just for Shakymuni? Is it just for monks removed from the day to day? Do you have to sell all your worldly possessions? Nope. The potential for buddhahood exists within everyone in their current form. All we need is the tool to call it out from within and experience a state of unshakeable happiness and compassion. Come join us for a discussion about a buddhist practice that opens the door for anyone to attain this supreme state of life.
print_description: Come join us for a discussion about a buddhist practice that opens the door for anyone to attain enlightenment in their current life and form.

title: Open Source Everything
description: Replacing Mass Production with Mass Innovation. Join the new industrial revolution, where anyone can make anything with a little help from the Internet and some friendly robots. Open source ideals have transformed the world of software and electronics, and now we're bringing those same ideals to the world of physical parts and products. 21st century technology and online communities are constantly dissolving the barriers to designing and creating useful real life objects, and ideas are spreading openly across the world. Liberate yourself from the confines of consumerism and start building the future you want to live in! Come to see what we've been making, and learn how you can be a maker too!
print_description: Open Source Everything: Replacing Mass Production with Mass Innovation [and robots]. Join the NEW Industrial Revolution with John English

title: Paint Your Booty!
description:
Come by for some mutual paint smearing. Bring a friend, grab some colors, and fingerpaint each other to glory. Or have one of our painters turn you into an Avatar, plenty of blue to go around. Semi-temporary results vary. Caricature artists will also be on hand to draw you up, burner style. Makes a great souvenir! Whether you end up with blue balls or pinkadots all over, join us for an evening of painterly fun.

We also have been creating our own unique, highly renowned, medallions for 8 years this burn. Many residents and BRC Rangers seek us out to renew friendships and get a new medallion every year. This year, we will have a very special medallion. All we ask in return is to show yer bum and get spanked!

All of our activities will take place under a large, inviting, and stimulating
shade structure (night AND day) in front of LAFer Camp with plenty of chairs for residents to get off their feet or bike and chill or play with our paints and other toys—all week long. We have many camp hosts/musicians from across the U.S. of A, that are always ready to fill their cup with a cold beverage or morning hot coffee to help from the previous night's bender, and jaw with passersby.
print_description: Come by for some mutual paint smearing. Bring a friend, grab some colors, and fingerpaint each other to glory. You'll be glad you did!

title: Paint Your Partner
description: Paint Your Partner. At the beginning of the class Scott would help pair up anyone who didn't come with a partner and I'd give a few tips for picking out suitable paint colors. Each pair would get a medium sized brush, a small cup of water and 2 or 3 colors of paint in tiny containers or on a palette to minimize waste. Then we'd talk about different sources of inspiration for imagery such as music, personality, mood, body contours and clothing. I'd like to put on some music when they start painting and give each person about 15 minutes to paint before trading places.
print_description:
Bring your partner or meet a new one.
Explore with paint and music body contours, mood, clothing and personality.

title: PHONOFLaKES live @ Center Camp
description:
PHONOFLaKES: The best Alternative Rock / Power Pop that Europe has to offer!

Sometimes following your instincts is the easiest path to success. PHONOFLaKES from Switzerland, Europe followed this route.

The band presents emotional, yet wrenching work, which needs no explanation. With an uncompromising and spontaneous Alternative Rock / Power Pop, their music is a strong and honest impact that gets to you. And it is this strength, expressed through their simple but direct naturalness, which has always been a defining quality of the bands live shows.

PHONOFLaKES displays a personality equaled by no other band. Singer Melanie Schweickardt’s exceptional voice puts the band among the greatest Swiss bands – despite the fact they just started working on their debut long player in April 2010.

«We made it!» isn’t in the vocabulary of this tireless group. The main goal of PHONOFLaKES is to move ever forward. There’s no doubt what so ever – these guys know what to do and how to do it.

In 2009, the band played several shows in San Francisco’s Bay Area, a live radio showcase on KPDO 89.3 pirate cat radio and also performed on the center camp stage at Burning Man 2009.

PHONOFLaKES promised to come back to California and Burning Man 2010 and they will give you a night to remember!
print_description: PHONOFLaKES: Best Alternative Rock / Power Pop that Europe has to offer! The band presents emotional, yet wrenching work, which needs no explanation.

title: Pimp Your Bike!
description:
Bioluminati has been illuminating BRC for 16 years with art, quests. and now, PIMP YR BIKE! The bling-ification station where we provide non-moopy materials and advice for Black Rock Citizens to upgrade their rides with that extra get-up-and-glow.

Open Tuesday to Saturday. Great for kids!

title: PIÑATA'S REVENGE
description:
PIÑATA'S REVENGE is a moving interactive performance in which a 'Living Piñata' is suspended from a giant seesaw boom above an Art Car, the PiñataMobile. One at a time, individuals will be allowed to engage the Living Piñata in traditional piñata-combat--involving padded bats. 

Just as with a traditional piñata, if people strike the Living Piñata's body hard enough, treasures will 'bleed' forth. 

But unlike a traditional piñata, people will have to strike with care, because THIS TIME the Piñata will ALSO be armed with a padded bat--with which to exact its revenge! 

Behold--PIÑATA'S REVENGE! 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hf7TRIX201U

In 2010 our 'Living Piñatas' will appear as Fritz-Lang-inspired robots from Metropolis. In this way the classic battle between Man and Piñata will come to symbolize the quintessential struggle of Modernity--between Man's natural and mechanical selves.
print_description: DO YOU DARE engage the 'Living Piñata' in traditional combat? His blood is your treasure! Beware, THIS Piñata is armed and ready to exact his REVENGE!

title: Playa Names/Ice-T @ Identi-T Farm
description:
We will be providing a Playa-Name-giving service, based upon interview, discussion and our powers of empathy, in order to understand the deeper sense or spirit of the individual before us, and reveal their true name within. Any potential name is always discussed and ultimately agreed upon by a quorum of three people before being chosen. Once chosen, a short baptismal ceremony is performed by our very own Master of Ceremonies, a personalized badge is hand-drawn by our resident artists and offered to the person, who then sign or draw their newly-acquired Playa Name in our Book of Names. 

As with last year, passers-by may also choose to have a Tarot Reading from our resident Witch Doctor while waiting. New this year, we will be offering delicious iced tea to quench your playa thirst. Activities will all take place inside our new dome, where you can relax and enjoy.
print_description: Identi-T Farm, a City Concierge service. Get new identities/playa names, ice-t, tarot card readings, a pampering spa experience, yoga, meditation +

title: Playasophy Talks
description:
What is thought? Can cities think? Join us in Seeking the Wisdom of the Sand! Each mind-expanding Playasophy Talk is a philosophically-minded, Metropolis themed round-table discussion hosted by the Playasophers, with open-ended Q&A after an introductory Audio / Visual presentation. 

All philosophies & ideologies welcome! We come to learn from each other.

Planned Topics include:
Consciousness & Thought
The Technological "Singularity"
Sustainability & Thinking as a Species
Implications of Scientific Discovery
...and more

Check Playasophers.org for more detail on Playasophy Camp events as Burning Man 2010 approaches. See you on the playa!
print_description: What is thought? Can cities think? Seek the Wisdom of the Sand. Mind-expanding philosophy & Metropolis themed Talks w/ Q&A hosted by the Playasophers.

description: The Fungus Humongous is among us at the Cosmic Toy Camp!  Relax in our dome on the cushy toadstools under the giant cap of the Fungus Humongous. Be amongst the jellyfish spores who swim under this 15' tall cosmic glowing mushroom and partake in the many fun  toys they have brought to share.... and infect you with cosmic playfulness!  We've got mini RC helicopters and planes for you to fly as well as other toys to inspire your imagination. Come celebrate the FUNgus and the wonder of the PLAYa!
print_description: Relax under the cap of a 15’ tall mushroom & enjoy the RC flying (and other) toys we’ve brought to share with the citizens of BRC!

title: Playa Weddings!
description:
In the Burning Man spirit of love and celebration, the Lollipop Guild will perform non-binding Playa weddings for you and yours; embracing diversity and encouraging creativity.

It is our goal to present these weddings as a celebration of love while embracing the moment and enjoying life!  Our unions are a quasi-political statement noting that diversity in love is as unique as the individuals involved and that happiness is a right for everyone.  We encourage you to embrace what moves you and enjoy your very own OUTrageous ceremony!

Your special bonding ceremony will be complete with classic attire options,
music, guests, decorations and digital photography.  Or add your own personal
touch by wearing your favorite outfit or nothing at all.  Bring your in-laws,
your camp-mates, or your brand new friends.   Walk away with a personalized
certificate to commemorate this extraordinary event and the digital photos that are taken of you will be made available online soon after Burning Man.

Multiple people or objects may be joined together in one playa union. Feel free to marry your loving partner, your trick from last night, your sexual enhancement apparatus, your favorite vegetable, your best friend or your 3 best friends.  It's all good!

Weddings will be performed in the Lollipop Guild Chapel Tuesday through Friday between the hours of 3:00pm and 5:00pm.  Then, on Friday from 5:00pm until 7:00pm, be sure to join us as we host a mass wedding reception for all of
those who have participated in the weddings.  Cocktails will be provided.  We hope to see you there!
print_description:
In spirit of love and celebration, the Lollipop Guild will perform non-binding
Playa weddings; multiple people or objects may be joined together.

title: Poly High Tea
description:
Just what is Poly High Tea? - First, it's a Tea Party. We will be serving Tea and Cookies...

All you Polyamorous, poly-curious, and poly-friendly folks out there on the playa are invited to join us for a discussion about the practical issues of loving more than one in an open, responsible multi-person relationship. There are many workable forms of Polyamorous relationship - polyamory is polymorphic! There is much wisdom in the poly community which can be helpful to people trying to make *any* relationship work, monogamous or Polyamorous. There will be a facilitated discussion in which you can get your questions addressed and some of the knowledge in our community can be shared.

If you'd like to cool off and de-dust yourself after our tea party, bring a water donation to enjoy PolyParadise's famous Human Carcass Wash.
print_description: All you Poly, poly-curious, and poly-friendly folks out there on the playa join us for a discussion about the practical issues of loving more than one

title: Post-Critical Tits  Ride All Women's Ritual
description:
All women and girls: Embody freedom lost and found. Sing, drum, and dance a body prayer home to yourself, your sisters and your wild heart.  

This year, once again, the Critical Tits Ride will lead to a Women's Only Ritual on the open playa.  

Bike Parking Gods will usher all female, or identifying as female, riders into the bike parking area. From there, enter the Ritual on foot, passing through the Serenading Portals of the Acaplaya Choir, into the Ritual Ring. All are invited to join their voices with the choir and welcome their sisters into the Ritual Ring.

The circumference of the Ring is held by the bodies of our Sacred Space Holders - facing outward towards the open playa to engage looky loos asking them to respect the event and lower the cameras.  Along the circumference, at each of the cardinal points - East/Child, South/Maiden, West/Warrior Mother, North/Crone - are our Drummers, grounding our spirits while enticing our bodies to fly.  Our Nipple Card Goddesses will again offer CT Nipple cards as well as ribbons on which to write prayers to be tied to the circumference of the Ritual Ring. The ribbons will later be taken to the temple to burn.

As the ritual reaches a critical mass of tits, one of our High Priestesses will begin the dancing body prayer - connecting us to our own wild hearts, those of our sisters' and out to that of the playa itself.

Not for spectators. We invite partners and friends to help hold the ritual space. We need volunteers for set up/clean up, bike parking, drumming and holding of the ritual space. If you want to get involved, contact us at info2010(at)criticaltits(dot)com.
print_description: All women and girls: Embody freedom lost and found. Sing, drum, and dance a body prayer home to yourself, your sisters and your wild heart. For Women.
other_location: at the end of the Critical Tits Ride

title: Pour Some Fire Down Your Throat
description: Last year we locked down our little corner of Blackrock City with crowds that extended down the streets in every direction. For our first year as an official camp, bar nights were an epic success. Who could resist? A fiery sign and hot bartenders serving up flaming drinks that scorched the tongue and burned all the way down. For 2010 we're bringing back our classic hot pepper drinks and adding a few more exclusive pours to the Incendiary Intent bar. We kick off the burn on Monday night with an open bar and fire performance, taking in that enthusiasm the first day brings. Lighting up and pouring drinks on Wednesday and Friday, we're sure to get some returning friends and a whole new crowd ready to taste our wicked brews. Fire performers take the stage and dance on the sign.
print_description: Incendiary Intent will be serving some tasty drinks on Wednesday and Friday night. We'll be serving spicy drinks with a flair, stop by and join us!

description:
Solve Puzzles and Puns in our PLAYPEN - When 2 players find pieces of a puzzle and touch each other, then buzzers buzz, lights light & prizes are won.

title: Quality of Touch
description:
"Quality of Touch" is something we all recognize when we feel it. Some touches are just warm and delightful, others teasing, others cold and frightening, others...just icky. So what makes the difference, and how can YOU make sure that you know what your touch communicates? By focusing on your quality of touch.
The goal of the class is to increase mindfulness with regard to consent, communication and presence in their touch. In addition, it is intended to emphasize your responsibility to consider (or help establish) and maintain each others boundaries. Finally, it will deliver a simple set of exercises in touch and communication that can help use TOUOCH more effectively and consciously, as well as emphasize the importance of mindfulness when touching other.
print_description: Learn when/where/what/who/why/HOW to touch with respect, consent, presence and intent. Enhance the way you touch and communicate. Class fills fast.

title: Queer Kabbalah
description: Kabbalah, the ancient system of Jewish mystical and esoteric thought, has a complex and nuanced understanding of gender identity and eroticism.  Men with female souls, a multi-gendered God -- this is not the BS about some old man in the sky judging you for jerking off.  In this non-apologetic and non-traditional workshop, we'll look at a few Kabbalistic teachings on gender and sexuality, particularly queer sexuality and transgender souls.  The workshop will be led by an 8-time burner, radical faerie & Ph.D. candidate in Jewish Thought who has published 2 books on Kabbalah and taught Jewish mysticism for 15 years.
print_description: A non-apologetic & non-traditional workshop, looking at a few Kabbalistic teachings on gender & sexuality, esp. queer sexuality & transgender souls.

title: Queer Sexual Liberation
description: Cum unlock your radical sexual creativity! Some of the most heated battles in our society concern sex & relationships. How do we, as queers or queer allies, approach these issues in our personal lives? How do we integrate our radical politics with our most intimate relationships? How do we talk about sex with our political allies/families/friends who may not share our views of sexuality? How can we keep ourselves safe in exploring the boundaries of sex and relationships? What do we hope for in a world to come?  This workshop will explore many aspects of sexual liberation including: BDSM, Leather, Polyamory, Non-monogomy, sex work, and more. All genders welcome all ways.
print_description: Cum unlock your radical sexual creativity! Discuss BDSM/leather, polyamory, sex work & more.  All queers welcome! All genders welcome!

title: Socially Appropriate Eat-With-Your-Mouth-Open Day
description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon. And that's why our natural inclination is to eat with our mouths open. What's the big deal about what it looks like? You're willing to put it in your mouth and chew but you're not willing to look at it? That's like a carnivore who's unwilling to kill their own cow. So, go ahead and taste what you've been missing—today you can eat with your mouth OPEN!
print_description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon.

title: Random Construction Inspections
description:
RANDOM CONSTRUCTION INSPECTIONS
Can your camp withstand 60 MPH winds? Are those crisscrossing strings and stakes a nocturnal deathtrap? Is that flimsy carport destined to fly across this playa like Dorothy’s Kansas shack? Hard-hatted, clipboard-carrying, semi-qualified men and women will conduct random inspections on the worthiness of your unit and issue seals of approval or failure, after bossing you around to their liking and if necessary, introducing you to the business end of a rebar cutter. Results guaranteed.

title: Reiki Attunement for Sexual Healing
description:
Come join the fun with a short Reiki Attunment to amp up your energy. Find out where your blocks are and why they are there. Give and receive healings for happiness, well being and the removal of emotional blockages. The healing will be centred at the Base or Root and Heart Chakra for sexual healing. Hands on healing all boundaries are respected. Singles and partners welcome. 

Every relationship we ever experience with our parents, friends, kids, lovers, co-worker, boss etc, has an effect on who we are our personalities and our sexuality. Many times this works like a wall that we put up that keeps us from our true desires and keeps us from happiness and it can also work like a chastity belt of; rejection, anger, fear and other emotions. When the class is over participants will feel one of these emotional weights have been lifted. They will feel lighter. Their Heart Chakra’s will be open and Root Chakra will be lighter and feel protected. it is possible relationships of every kind will be more nurturing and healthy.
print_description: Come join the fun with a short Reiki Attunment to amp up your energy. Find out where your blocks are and why they are there. Give and receive healings

title: Restoration & Awakening of the Sacred Feminine
description:
aka Women's Shakti empowerment 1 st Charkra temple Friday Sept 3, 2 to 4 PM. 
Many women seek the solace of the Sisterhood to help help empower and reclaim their sacred feminine wounded from male violation. 

While useful in diminishing shame and guilt, women sometimes fuel the "righteous" rage and distrust for the male energy as well. Power at the expense of your innermost yearnings.

If you had an awful relationship with your Father, could your loving mother and sisters ever give you more than a band-aid for this wound to your feminine Spirit

How likely is it that holding soft kittens will ever heal you from a fear of Dogs after being severely mauled.

In this ceremony, 2 or 3 women will be selected as surrogates for the other participants. They will be transported into an ecstatic bliss and utter rapture that will eclipse the usual, more directly sexual Tantric offerings as this work awakens your deepest sexual goddess but does not "tamper" with you.

title: Safe/Successful Entheogenic Experiences On Playa
description: Teonanacatl, the tool of the gods on the playa. This lecture will focus on the Tryptamines in general, and the sacred mushrooms that produce these chemical in particular. The need for individuals to have a good understanding of their relationship with the Tryptamines is essential, and the knowledge of these powerful and sacred tools is paramount to revealing set goals for your experiences. I will discuss dosage guidelines, as well as medical implications, diet, and set and setting. There is also a need for understanding how your state of mind, diet, and other medications can drastically change your experience, as well as the effects of “layering”, or mixing different substances. I will also be discussing the importance of safety from both a legal standpoint, as well as a practical standpoint. Also a discussion of the on-playa resources for those who find themselves or a campmate in psychological distress. and where to go in case there is a need for professional medical and/or psychological assistance. The Witness Protection Connection: A Dating Service for the Personae non Gratae has been giving out silk flowers all week long representing your sexual preference: white for hetero; red for bi; blue for gay; pink for lesbian; and yellow for transgendered. Hopefully, as you traveled around the city during the week you ran across someone else wearing/displaying a flower matching your color and you introduced yourself. Maybe there was an attraction there and as you parted you invited them to meet you at The Booby Bar in Terminal City village right after the burn on Saturday night. Ah romance! title: So You Think You're Hot?
description:
The now infamous camp challenge is back. With origins dating all the way back to the 1980s, this camping tradition has morphed into something truly monstrous. During the heat of the day, in triple digit temperatures, one must eat a helping of five-alarm chili, cooked with the dreaded Guatemalan insanity pepper (grown only by the inmates of a Guatemalan insane asylum). Then, to wash it down, a shot of hot pepper vodka, also infused with the same insanely hot pepper. Now, when you want nothing more than an ice-cold beverage to quench the fire burning in your mouth, you instead must chug a cheap, warm beer that's been sitting out in the sun since daybreak.

Why, might you ask, would anyone want to do this? Hell if we know! It's a terrible idea! It's a horrible thing to conceive, much less do on purpose! Yet, as demonstrated by the droves of people who participated AND completed the challenge in 2009, we apparently underestimated human nature. Not only did crowds show up for the challenge, but they returned over the course of the week to to share the pain with their friends. And by share, we mean point and laugh while grown men cried and stumbled down the street in a daze. We even had a university anthropologist come hangout, just to observe this odd aspect of human behavior. How could we not bring this back for 2010?
print_description: If you dare, eat a bite of our chili, and take a shot of our hot as hell insanity pepper vodka, and follow it up by chugging a hot beer.

By the way, we're talking dancing here.  What were you thinking?  Spanky's is hosting its inaugural Swing Dance Party, and you're invited. We'll have some great music for dancing, or just listening.  Come dance with us on the open playa at Spanky's Wine Bar.

We'll have a lesson for beginners at 8:00.  Open dancing starts at 8:45 and runs to midnight.

title: Spinning at sunrise
description:
Come spin twirl and whirl in celebration and watch the horizon change from dark to light until you collapse in a fit of laughter glory and dizziness.

Last year at sunrise at the foot of where the man used to be we were warming ourselves after a night of... well lots of things really... we saw a man in a white suit rise, walk towards the sun, and start spinning with his arms outstretched. "I wanna do that" my friend said immediately as she rose from our warm coodle and started towards the man. Before we knew it another group started towards the man with us. We all outstretched our arms and slowly began spinning... As I spun faster and faster I started noticing the horizon line as it changed from dark to light dark to light. I started loosing my sense of where I was and this only made me want to spin faster. I could hear my friends giggling out of one ear then the other one then the other like stereo speakers. Trying to maintain my balance I spun as fast as I could and for as long as possible until I collapsed in a puddle of laughter. As the world spun around me all my friends stumbled toward me and fell upon me into a giant coodle. 

I thought it would be fun share this experience and see a large group of ppl together spinning at sunrise. Bring props to spin like streamers etc. Bring your friends etc.
print_description: Come spin twirl and whirl in celebration and watch the horizon change from dark to light until you collapse in a fit of laughter glory and dizziness.

title: STD Basics
description: A discussion on common sexually transmitted diseases/infections. Including HPV, Trichomoniasis, Chlamydia, Herpes, Gonorrhea, Hepatitis, HIV/AIDS and Syphilis. What are the symptoms associated with each. What sexual practices put you at risk for each. What tests are available to detect them and how often should be tested. What can you do to prevent infections and what treatments are available. Safer Sex Camp is a drug free zone (this includes tobacco and alcohol). Photography is prohibited. Participants only.

description:
We are going push our piano from the top of the dispatch tower, then watch and listen as its smashes onto the Playa while listening to Kris Kristofferson's Sunday Morning Coming Down.

On the Sunday morning sidewalk,
Wishing, Lord, that I was stoned.
'Cos there's something in a Sunday,
Makes a body feel alone.
And there's nothin' short of dyin',
Half as lonesome as the sound,
On the sleepin' city sidewalks:
Sunday mornin' comin' down.

title: Swag*Exchange Outpost
description: Could I please have a souvenir? Over the years, individuals and camps have become very creative in their souvenirs. We’ve seen some amazing stickers, patches, pins, t-shirts, scarves, cups, mugs, cast metal pendants, glass icons... For those interested in collecting images and ideas to decorate our default world and remind us to smile and remember, SwagExchange is a place for visitors to exchange stickers, patches, pins, and other event swag. We’ll have an honor-system table in the Cityscape Lounge for participants to leave what they can, take what they like, and talk about all the cool stuff they’ve seen. Just like last year, Above The Limit is offering a variety of different and colorful souvenirs, so if you’re a serious collector or someone whose computer monitor or cube wall needs a reminder of something much more fun, come on by!
print_description: SwagExchange - a place to exchange stickers, patches, pins, or other event souvenirs that make us smile and remember once back in the default world.

title: Sweat Your Prayers w/Masha
description: To sweat is to pray, to make an offering of your innermost self. Sweat is holy water, prayer beads, pearls of liquid that release your past. . . . Sweat is an ancient and universal form of self healing, whether done in the gym, the sauna, or the sweat lodge. We do it on the dance floor. The more you dance, the more you sweat. The more you sweat, the more you pray. The more you pray, the closer you come to ecstasy. - Gabrielle Roth Sweat and pray with Masha as she guides you through Gabrielle Roth's 5Rhythms - flowing, staccato, chaos, lyrical and stillness.

title: Synchronize! Interdimensional Art Movement
description: It is a spoken workshop that shares how to become aware of the individual, the collective and universal needs. The main focus is a Synchronizing Template that I have created that is a tool to visualize the interconnectivity of individual realization to that of a collective participation. Touching on art movement, interdimensional existence and new forms of government. As for me I have created "Tribe13" and the "Interdimensional Art Movement" which has helped catapult and strenghten great visionaries such as Luke Brown, Carey Thompson, and so many more including making the vision of such greats as Robert Venosa, Martinna Hoffman, Alex and Alyson Grey acccesible to communities. My Workshop aims to make vision clear and most important "synchronize" to our potential. Thank you for this opportunity. -Roman Villagrana a.k.a. SynchroMystic
print_description: Roman Villagrana, one of the leaders of the Visionary Art Movement discusses interdimensional existence, art, and synchronicity.

title: Tantsu: Tantric Shiatsu
description: Tantsu is tantric shiatsu. Learn to share this powerful form of deeply nuturing bodywork with a partner. Done on the floor learn easily maintained whole body holds that support powerful stretching and release of energy along the meridians and in the energy centers, or chakras. Learning to give each other a Tantsu session leads to deeper connection, accessing flows of energy within the body and creating deep levels of peace. bio can be way shortened:Amber Seitz, Massage Therapist, Yoga Teacher, Tantra Facilitator. Her 20 years experience in the healing arts will give you an effective and transformative experience. Amber enjoys teaching yoga that includes hatha, pranayama, kundalini, feldenkrais awareness through movement, and guided meditation into spiritual connections. She is teaching tantra classes in which energy awareness and ecstatic states can be invoked. Her training has been with Margo Annand, Charles and Caroline Muir, Ipsalu, and the School of Tantra. She is also a practitioner and teacher of Tantsu which is shiatsu and tantra and has personally cocreated tantsu for couples with Harold Dull the originator of this new bodywork.
print_description: Tantsu is tantric shiatsu. Learn to share this powerful form of deeply nurturing bodywork with a partner.

title: Technomadic Lifestyle Workshop
description:
Why wait until retirement to explore the world?

Technology is making it ever easier to work online, so why not take the next step, take your home on the road, and really be location independent? Give in to your wanderlust - come learn how!

Camp Nomadia founders Seeder & Serolynne (www.technomadia.com) have been living together technomadically since May 2007, having giving up their conventional fixed homes to create a conscious merging of life, work, sustainable living, travel, community and adventure.  They currently base their adventures out of their custom built, solar-powered, and thoroughly geeked-out 17’ fiberglass trailer. Their geographic flexibility has allowed them to travel back and forth across the continent, attending interesting events (and regional burns!), meeting amazing people, and seeing incredible things -- all without sacrificing their ability to run their software development and consulting business, or lessening their ties to friends, family, and community.

Some of the other experienced technomads from Camp Nomadia will also be sharing their stories, offering up practical advice and insights to help others make the leap to a life without a fixed home base.

This workshop will focus on practical tips on how to leave a fixed-place existence behind and explore a life of technomadism. Topics covered will include selecting the right arsenal of technology to work successfully on the road, constructing your ideal mobile home (wheels, sails, backpacks, or...), and legal issues such as domicile, voting, vehicle registration, and taxes.
Immediately after the Technomadic Lifestyle Workshop there will be a Nomadic Happy Hour, so plan to hang around to mix and mingle with a bunch of other current and future nomads.

Camp Nomadia is intentionally unplaced this (our third) year, so check for our on-playa location at Playa Info (and likely on our website as well) and come find us.
print_description: Technology is making it ever easier to work online, so why not take your home on the road and really be location independent? Come learn how!

Experience how this radically different form of bodywork can leave you feeling balanced, opened and energized!  Note that Thai massage is done in comfortable clothing, without the use of oils. Yoga experience is helpful but not required.  In this workshop you will experience:  - Simple Thai bodywork techniques that anyone can do - Great ways to help someone stretch, relax and get energized - The healing energy of assisted yoga poses and acupressure - Pure relaxation receiving "lazy person's yoga" while your partner works on you!  Arrive with a partner, or find one there.

title: The Burn of the Threshold of Heat and Light
description:
After the man! Join the El Dorado Procession and the Burn of The Threshold of Heat and Light. El Dorado is the lost city of gold. The Threshold is a giant white cube covered in the visionary writings of passersby.

"Where have you been?", "Where are you going?", "Where Are You Now?"

The invitation to passersby over the week will be to write on the cube their answers. At the end of the week, covered in answers, inspirations, observations, and sensations, the miniature temple to transitions will be immolated on its own sacred pyre.

Write on it during the week, then, after the man burns, come to Guangzhou & 7:20 and join us in a festive  torch-lit procession accompanied by musicians, fire-dancers, and drummers, by mythical characters, soldiers, and pallbearers in golden robes who, en masse, will lift the structure in its decorated entirety and carry it to its appointed pyre on the inner playa. The Threshold of Heat and Light will die in flames and thus cross its own Threshold and carry with its cremation the reins that will pull the hundreds who have written on its walls across the lines of their own Thresholds standing between Where They Have Been and Where They Are Going. In the transcendent fire their intentions will create their futures.
print_description: Participate in the ritual, procession, and burn of The Threshold of Heat and Light, a giant white cube covered in the visionary writings of passersby
other_location: Threshold built and lives at El Dorado, 7:20 & G, and will be carried from there in festive procession to its burn site on the inner playa.

title: The Crystal Cavern
description: Camp Above The Limit's ultimate evening bar lounge chill space is a 40 foot dome brilliantly illuminated with giant (as in up to 18 foot) fluorescent crystals that shoot up from the walls to the ceiling. Colorful mushrooms adorn the inner and outer edges of the dome, and a giant dragon mandala tops the dome ceiling. The Crystal Cavern offers exotic beverages and hand-crafted homebrews nightly. A carpeted space covered with huge, soft, fluffy pillows allows guests to talk, listen to music, or just hang out and watch the colored crystals. Take off your shoes, leave the dust behind, and imagine what wonders lie undiscovered beneath the ground.
